111232.content:
Your name is Jackson Bivolt, but everyone just calls you Jack. You are a dedicated young pokemon trainer who has a preference for electric types, and you have captured many powerful ones so far. You were always a fairly unorthodox trainer, as you never wanted to evolve any of your pokemon. Your motto was to make them as powerful as you possibly could without changing them, and all of your pokemon seemed to like you more for not forcing evolution on them like some other trainers might. You were currently training with a special pokemon in the middle of the woods.

Recently, you had received an egg from the pokemon daycare center. It had hatched only a few days ago, and to your surprise, the pokemon inside of it was a shiny Pichu. From the moment you looked each other in the eye, you felt a special bond had formed between the two of you. In the time after she had hatched, you had started training vigorously together. By now, she was proving to be amazingly strong. To your amazement, she was now capable of defeating many opponents that not even your Raichu back home was able to defeat. Her electrical attacks were as dangerous as she was adorable. You were in awe at how powerful she had become in just those few days of training, and you enjoyed the fact that Pichu was always by your side. Seeing the immense amount of raw voltage that she was capable of producing so soon after hatching, you could tell that there was clearly something special about this Pichu. You had eventually decided that she would be your partner for the remainder of your journeys as a trainer.

After wrapping up another day of intense training, you and Pichu sat down next to each other to watch the sunset and relax. You reached out and rubbed her head, and she smiled up at you in joy. As the sun set, you decided that it would be best to go to bed now so that you could get up early in the morning. Crawling into your sleeping bag, you cuddle up with Pichu next to you and fall asleep. Little did you know that moments after you fell asleep, Pichu got up out of the sack and wandered off into the woods by herself!

By the time you woke up, Pichu had already returned. She was now standing on top of your stomach and holding a strange looking berry in her hands. Seeing you awake, she set the berry down on top of you and smiled. You didn't think anything of it, as Pichu had often brought back oran berries and the like for you to eat for breakfast in the past. You trusted that she would be able to tell the difference between a safe berry and a poisonous one.

"Aw, thanks Pichu... You brought me breakfast again... That's sure nice of you..."

Pichu simply smiled at you and responded with a typical "Pichu!" cry.

You reach out and pluck the berry off of your chest and toss it into your mouth. It tastes absolutely delicious, but moments later, you feel yourself loosing consciousness. When you wake up again, you are startled to see that everything around you is much bigger than before. What's more, your 1 foot tall Pichu is now towering over you! At your current size, she looks like she's at least 50 feet tall! You begin to panic, but suddenly you hear a soothing feminine (if not a bit childish) voice calling out to you.

"Don't worry Jack, I won't let anything hurt you... Please calm down..."

In your state of shock, you look around the immediate area for the source of this voice. You soon realize that the only one around was Pichu, but she couldn't have said that, could she? You decide that there's no harm in trying to talk to her and find out.

"Pichu? Did you say something just now?"

To your shock, she actually answered you!

"Yes Daddy Jack, I did. I'm sorry if I scared you earlier..."

"Wha?! How did you just-"

"It was the berry I gave you! It shrank you and gave you the ability to speak pokemon language! Isn't it awesome, daddy?"

"Ummm... I guess that it's kinda cool... But why would you do this to me, Pichu?"

"Because I love you, daddy! I thought that if I shrunk you like this, then I would be able to take care of you and protect you the way that you always did with me! Don't you think that it'll be fun?"

"Maybe, but what about being a pokemon trainer? I can't really go on my journey at this size, can I? Don't you want to face all of the region's gym leaders with me?"

"Oh, I do daddy! Don't worry though, the berry only lasts for about a day or two. Unless you eat another one, you'll turn back to normal by that time. Unfortunately, you won't be able to talk with me anymore unless you do..."

"Well, as much as I want to get back to normal and continue with my journey, I think that this could actually be a lot of fun. Pichu, do you think that you could take me to where you found that berry? I think that we should stockpile them to use during our time off."

"Does that mean that you aren't mad at me, Daddy Jack?"

"Of course not, Pichu! We're partners, and I trust you. I honestly wouldn't mind doing this whole 'shrink and hang out with you' thing whenever I have free time. I actually kinda like it. Mostly the being able to talk to you part, but I must say that seeing things from this angle is quite interesting as well. "

"Yay! Thanks daddy, I love you so much!"

Pichu then picks you up off of the ground and cuddles you into her big red cheek. Feeling Pichu's body heat from this size is surprisingly calming, and you can't help but reach out and hug her cheek. Pichu simply giggles and holds you out in front of her again.

"Okay Daddy Jack, what do you want to do now? We can always go get some more of those berries for later if you want, or we could play a game together for now and do that later! What do you think, daddy?"

It's another wonderful day in the world of Pokemon. The sun is shining bright, and you are training with Raichu as usual. For six years, ever since coming of age as a Trainer at ten, you have played and explored and travelled with him. He started off as a Pikachu, often climbing up on your shoulder when you went anywhere. Through sheer willpower, you managed your way through beating Brock, the first gym leader, and the Water Gym Leader Misty had been no problem. After you fought and made a close victory over Lt. Surge, he'd offered you a Thunder Stone, saying that the decision to evolve should be made between Pokemon and Trainer.

You watch as your Charmander girl runs around and plays with the several Poke toys in your house. She certainly seems to be enjoying them. As you watch her, you start to feel tired. It's been a long day, and you finally doze off.

When you awaken, you immediately realize something isn't right. Everything seems to have a different perspective to it than usual, and looking around, you realize to your horror that you appear to have shrunken. Which does no seem appealing to you.

Somehow, your clothes shrunk with you, which is a plus, and so you get to your feet and look around. You're unable to tell how big you are, but you can't be more than a few inches now. You're still on the couch, though, and decide to walk around to get your bearings and see where your Charmander is. You wonder if she shrunk too.

You get your answer quickly. The Charmander suddenly appears from over the edge of the couch, her two clawed hands grasping the edge and pulling herr body up so that you can see her head. Her large blue eyes--even larger now--are aimed right at you, and a grin appears on her face as she lets out a happy cry. You stare in shock, unable to react as one of her hands shoots forward and grabs you. The fingers curl around you tightly, squeezing you uncomfortably and pinning your arms, and you let out a shout as you're dragged off the couch and along with your Charmander as she lets go of the edge of the couch and drops to the floor.

When you recover from the dazing of that sudden motion, you look up to see your Charmander staring at you, holding your now tiny body right in front of her face. You're too stunned to do anything but stare, but your Charmander seems less surprised, and in fact, appears...

Squeezing you against her scaly, cream-colored chest, she lets out a happy cry. You can't help but smile at the cute display of affection from your Pokemon. Even at your tiny size, she still likes you, and doesn't seem to want to hurt you.

After a little bit, she releases you from the embrace, but still keeps a firm grip on you with one of her clawed hands. You don't squirm at all, trusting your Charmander girl to not hurt you while you're in her fist. You look into her blue eyes, wondering what she's going to do next. And come to think of it, you're also curious how you shrunk at all. It's good that your Charmander is gentle, but... Why did you shrink, and can you return to normal?

You wonder if it would be a good idea to ask your Pokemon. She might not be able to speak, but maybe she could understand you and reply in some nonverbal way... Though you know that your concerns about being in her mouth were at least a teensy bit justified (not that you'd ever think she'd hurt you now), it hurts knowing that your reluctance has caused her so much grief. This was really weighing down on her...

"I...know that isn't...an excuse, but...I never wanted you to get hurt!"

Buizel was almost thrashing around on the loveseat now, eyes clenched shut, and the beginnings of tears dripping down her face. You feel sick to your stomach, frustration overcoming you; you'd probably punch your dream self if he were here right now. In a newfound burst of strength brewed by your conviction, you flip your body around in your partners grasp, hug yourself tightly into her paw, and plant your lips harshly into her fur. Over and over again, you press peck after peck across her fuzzy fingers, keeping them close to your form as you gasp in breaths, getting your blood flowing again. Already, she's calming down; her tossing and turning weaken with each calming kiss you lay. You even start stroking her hand with your arms, slowly, yet firmly, letting her know that you're okay now, everything is okay...

Knowing that your actions might not be enough, you lean up and firmly speak. "There's nothing to be sorry for, Buizel. I trust you. I always have."

The comforting tone of your voice, though distant, was enough to rouse her from the troubled sleep she was in."Mmph! Mmmm..."

Finally, she loosens her grip on you, returning to the gentle, cuddling hold you were in before. This time you could breath well and good, facing her paws instead of the expanse of fine fuzz beneath you. You nuzzle yourself into the soft, cream-colored fur, letting the gentle, secure warmth of Buizel's belly soak into you. She responds by massaging you further into her coat, trapping you in an embrace you'd never want to leave.

"Thank you..."

You continue stroking your arms into her plush palm, returning the same gentle, soothing rubbing that lulled you to sleep. A deep exhaustion that you hadn't noticed before spread across your form, and you relax. She's calm. You're calm. Soon, rest comes for the both of you...

...


Eventually, you wake up on your own time, last night's happenings still foggy in your mind. Not-so-coincidentally, your partner wakes up right after; you two had always started the day together, so it makes sense that your internal clocks were set the same.

Buizel casually nudges a finger into your stomach.

"Hey, you awake yet?" she whispers, snickering a bit. You lie there for a moment, then suddenly wrap your arms and legs around her poking paw, blowing a raspberry into her fur.

"H-hehe, k-knock that off! You're tickling me!"

You pause for only a moment.

"Not a chance!"

Then you resumed your blowing. Buizel laughed, a pleasant nostalgia filling her. You used to do that to her when you woke up first, only you did it into her belly, like a normal raspberry. Although you were still tiny, and the minuteness of the sensation made that more than obvious, it was still reassuring to know that things weren't too different.

"Okay, okay, this is getting a bit old now," she huffs, a little smile still beaming through her lips as she plucks you away from her fingers with her other paw. You think about doing it again, but you decide against it. She was right; the joke ran its course a while ago. Still, it was pretty nice to do that, even at your size. Maybe things really won't be so different...

Just then, your partner noticed the slight stickiness of your body. She blinks, then smirks, remembering the details of last night. "Oh, jeez. I see I forgot to give you a little washdown after, uh, your little escapade downstairs. Lemme fix that..."

The paw holding you slowly lifts upwards, bringing you closer to Buizel's mouth.Her tongue lolls out alluringly, letting you get an intimate view of her open maw. An electric tingle shoots down your spine and pinpoints right on your crotch; even if you had amnesia, your body would likely respond the same way. You're not sure you'd ever forget what that tongue did to you...at least, not anytime soon.

Instead of just dumping you into her mouth, your partner gives you a teasing lick. The both of you realize just how bad of an idea that was near-instantly; Buizel almost immediately jerks her head aside and brings an arm up to her face, pressing her tongue against it to get rid of the rather unpleasant taste of all her (and partially your) bodily fluids that had dried off during the cool of the night.

"Blech," she gags, clearly not feeling like the smartest Pokemon around. "Man, why did I not see that coming..."

You look up at her, struggling not to laugh. You felt kind of bad for her, but again, what did she expect? As you sniff your body, though, you admit that it's probably a good idea to get you to some clean water ASAP.

Still, you had to milk this a little bit more.

"Ahaha! Now you know how it feels when I eat one of those mystery berries you give me. It's like playing Wheel of Misfortune with my taste buds sometimes!"

Buizel grumbles, minor annoyance shining through her disgust. "Hey! It's not like I got you poisoned or anything. I'm seriously gonna have to wash my mouth out! What kind of Water-Type has to do that?!"

"Apparently one that finally taste-tests her own food for once," you snicker back.

Your partner puffs up her cheeks. "Alright, that's it! You just earned yourself a good ol' watergunnin', mister!"

You chuckle nervously, not eager to get supersoaker'd just yet. "W-wait! Wait! It was just a joke-!"

A stream of cool water hits you in the face; or rather, it hits your entire body at once, but it would've hit you in the face if you were normal-size. This wasn't your first time getting hit with that move when Buizel was miffed; fortunately enough, she decided to go easy on you, only letting out a small squirt of cool liquid. Whatever vestiges of sleep were still clouding your mind were thoroughly washed away, unlike the gunk on your body. At this, the two of you flush hotly.

"W-wow. We...really got wild last night, didn't we?"

You gulp, recalling how lustful, yet at peace you felt while you were in her pussy. You could practically feel her heartbeat when you were giving her the massage of her lifetime.

"Y-yeah..."

An awkward moment passes. Buizel's blushing profusely, staring down at you in thought. She opens her mouth to speak, then closes it again, not really sure what to say; after a while, she just shakes her head and talks.

"Before we...get back into it, we should probably get you cleaned up first."

With that, she holds you to her chest and walks to the bathroom. A strong, cool breeze buffets you, a stark contrast to your partner's soothing body heat. The bobbing movement caused by her gait is making you slightly dizzy. You guess she never really took more than a couple of steps with you in hand until now.

In a moment, your partner steps into the bathroom with you in tow. Instead of bringing you to the sink, though, she turns and stares at the bath tub. It was larger than normal, and came pre-installed into the house. It made the leg space of the room a bit cramped, but its pros far outweighed its cons. Both you and Buizel could play together comfortably--and now, there was even more room to spare! Not to mention all the sorts of toys and

Buizel turned the hot water on, and you were both left to wait for the tub to slowwwly fill up. That's one of the cons; or at least, it would be if you and your partner ever ran out of ways to entertain each other. There were a variety of topics you wanted to speak to her about. The weird berry she made you eat, what the two of you were going to do today, her paranoia-induced nightmare...

You're not sure if you want to bring up that last one so soon. It'd probably put a damper on things. Well, even if it would be easier to ignore it, your better judgement tells you that isn't the best idea. That was...a pretty troubling dream she had. Anyhoo, it'd be good to break the silence. It wasn't awkward, but it wasn't soothing, either.

"Hey, Buizel," you blurt out.

She glances down at you, a. "Hmm?"

"Do you wanna talk about...
1131211212121.title: Buizel's Nightmare and a Morning Bath

choices: "..Nope! I'm a sea monster now! An hungry ancient Pokemon lost to time!!"
11312112121212.content:
Buizel perked up, a smile growing on her face as the countless possibilities for what the day may hold ran through her mind. It wasn't often that you and her had had a day completely to yourselves, let alone a full-on foreseeable future where you had no choice but to be inseparable. It brought her back to the time a blizzard left the two of you snowed-in, and together you lazed the chilly days and nights away sharing the same heavy blanket, and watching the same cheesy action shows.

Unlike the ever-changing condition of the weather though, what was keeping you two close now was something she had some amount of control over now, she just wasn't sure, yet, how much control she wanted to have.

"Uh... yeah! After our bath, we can do pretty much whatever we want for the whole day!...Er, after our bath and a hearty breakfast that is, I can imagine you're as peckish as I am."

You were indeed, stomach growling at the idea that it may soon be filled with actual food. "Literally. I feel like just few little bites of something would be enough to sate me at this size," you said with a giggle, finding the image of you nibbling at an oversized breakfast food, specifically an oversized stack of freezer pancakes that you often made the main part of your 'balanced' breakfast, to be just as humorous as it was humbling.

Buizel shared in your giggle for a moment, before getting latched onto a certain thought. "Hm, I wonder... Would the flavor of food be stronger or more subtle to you with you so small? Your tastebuds are teeny now, but how much does that really heighten the flavor of crumbs, I wonder..."

You thought back to the flavors you had already gotten a sampling of at your size, recalling their surprising sharpness even as they were diluted in spittle or detectable only via a, admittedly incredibly potent, aroma. "When there's something to taste, it's... very strong," you said simply, feeling as though you could detect the sickly sweet hint of Cheri berries on your tongue for just a second.

Your Pokemon raised an eyebrow. "How would you know? You haven't ate something at this size, have you?"

"I haven't... ate anything, but when I was in your mouth yesterday, I.... uh..."

Buizel blinked, before sending her free paw straight to her forehead. "O- Oh right. Totally spaced on the whole you having no choice but to swallow ounces of my saliva thing," she said like it was a perfectly normal sentence, glancing over to the nearly-full tub. "Bet you're glad we're about to take this bath. You can cleanse your body and your soul..."

"Hey, it was still better than some of those berries you've made me taste... Like way better... It's almost tragic how much better it was."

"Oh c'moooon, how long are you gonna keep bringing that up?"

"Forever until you apologize profusely," you sent back jokingly, making a dramatic show out of you crossing your arms and turning your head off to the side.

"Not a chance! Exposing yourself to new and exotic flavors helps to expand one's palate~!" she chirped like she'd become the host of a cooking show, slightly patronizing tone to her voice and all. And given how many of those kinds of shows she liked to watch, there was a good chance she had borrowed that notion wholesale from one of them.

"It certainly was... exotic," you murmured, finding the topic of berries had led you down a certain train of thought. "H- Hey Buizel, before we hop in... Uhm... Can you maybe give me a lowdown on what that shrinking berry's all about. On how it works and... how you found out about it."

Buizel paused for a moment, expression noticeably shifting. "Yeah, I first heard about that particular type of berry from an old tome I found in an ancient library, the book itself enchanted with a ghostly aura. As I flipped through the pages, I-"

"I know you're lying, and I'm not gonna let you pull the rug out from under me this time," you interrupted, probably more proud of yourself than you really should've been.

"I'm serious," she sent back without a drop of sarcasm, eyes boring into you.

You tensed up, feeling a chill run down your spine. "Y- You're.... serious?" you stuttered.

In a blink, her peepers went back to being lazy and half-lidded, smile becoming equally as smug-looking, "...No, I read up on it using your PC, and found one in the bushes over by the river."

She just had to find a way to pull the rug out from under you anyways, not to mention reveal that she sometimes uses your home PC without you even knowing. "Oh haha, you're so funny Buizel..."

"I know..." she returned as her cocky smirk only grew, setting you on the outer edge of the tub. This let the warmth radiating of the hot water wash over you with wave after goosebump-inducing wave, yet it was the look Buizel had started giving you that created the most truly pleasant feeling of warmth. That of the inward variety - a kind you were very familiar with as of late. "S- Seriously though, the berry's only meant to shrink those that ingest it for, like, two days tops. It should leave your system before the days up, and then, well... you'll grow back... "

Buizel reached over and turned off the water, returning her focus to you with eyes as soft as ever.

"And it's up to you once we're done with this bath, if, y'know... you want to just have breakfast with the fruit we already have here at home, or... go out and do a little bit of berry scavenging beforehand."

With that wording, you found yourself reminiscing on the times you and her went out berry-hunting. There was a decent while where you didn't quite understand what she got out spending hours on end searching for potentially terrible-tasting fruit, but when you finally decided to go out and share in her seemingly strange interest, and became privy to its charms, you made it a weekly habit to go foraging with her from then on. Just exploring the great outdoors with her was wonderful enough, but it was also surprisingly fun finding rare variants of berries growing in the wild on top of that. At least as long as she wasn't making you taste-test each and every one, that is.

It warmed your heart to know, though, that from here on out she wasn't going be pushy, or even remotely pressuring trying to get you to taste more of the latest berry you had sampled. She wouldn't dare be.

"But let's have this bath, huh?" she piped, suddenly jumping into the tub at speed great enough that it created a sizable splash, causing you to get drenched before you could even dip a toe in the water. Though you supposed that was the wrong way at looking at it, since you couldn't really 'dip your toe in the water' at this size anyways. The only way you were going to get cleanwas through splashes, and maybe the briefest dips below the surface cradled safely in a paw.

"So uh... how are we gonna do this?" you inquired, wondering if she had a plan for how to go about bathing with someone who had the capacity to drown in the tub.

Buizel maneuvered over to the edge, before letting her natural buoyancy let her easily float on her back. "Hop on..." she encourage warmly, drifting upwards so that her base was just a small jump away for you. "...C'mon, don't be shy~"

You're not sure how you could be at this point, but there was still something oddly daunting about the idea of using Buizel as your life raft. Admittedly, though, there was also something thrilling about it; the idea of having your treasured companion be the only thing keeping you above what was a considerably deep tub of water for you, even amongst all the deeply sensual acts the two of you had partaken in, felt special in its own, almost silly sort of way. And eventually, with a somewhat surprising amount of patience on her part, that thrill did win out in the end, getting you to leap forward onto Buizel's form like you were embracing a bed.

"Welcome aboard the S.S. Buizel," she chimed as you found your footing, bright beam forming on her muzzle, before twinging just a bit. "You may have come aboard at a bad time though, we've currently found ourselves trapped between four giant icebergs. There's no where to go..."

You looked across the wide range of the bathtub, supposing that equating its walls to towering icebergs was a decent enough comparison to make if she was really going for the whole 'S. S. Buizel' thing. "What's the protocol?" you sounded back with her same mockingly no-nonsense tone.

"The protocol is... to panic! Not only are we surrounded by impassable icebergs, but we were hit by one right on our port-bow! This ship'll be at the bottom of the ocean in less than a minute!"

"...I literally just boarded... and there's no way a single iceberg would sink an entire ship... Your story-telling leaves a lot to be desired."

"This isn't a story, this is real life! Now get on the lifeboat before you're swimming with the Magikarp!" she hollered, floating a rubber Ducklett by her form for you to jump to. Rolling your eyes, you played along, hopping on and clinging to it's light blue neck for dear life as it aimlessly spun around with you atop it.

When it finally came to a stop, and you found your bearings, you were able to get a good view of Buizel slowly submerging herself underneath the bathwater, clearly having far too much fun playing the role of a sinking ship. And for what felt like almost a full thirty seconds, you waited for her to reemerge, until she finally did with a dramatic slowness.

"What are you now, like a ghost ship or something?"

She chuckled in response, wiping her eyes. "Uh... I'm not really sure... I guess I didn't think this far down the roleplay..."

"Maybe you could start playing the role of a giant Buizel helping her tiny human get clean?"

Buizel brought a paw to her muzzle and tilted her head to the side, eventually answering...
11312112121212.title: The Tragedy of S. S. Buizel

choices: You and Buizel eat some breakfast at home.
You both go out to harvest some berries.
113121121212121.content:
You relax, the tension in your shoulders dissipating when you hear Buizel agree to wash you. She slowly moves her arm, grabbing the rubber Ducklett that you were on, then tilting you onto her open palm.

"Thanks. I've already got an idea of where that whole sea monster thing was going," you pause, thinking about what happened earlier. "Do you really want me in your mouth again, after what happened when we woke up?"

Buizel blinks, paw still resting on her muzzle. "Huh...I think I could find some way to make it work," she turns her eyes up, lost in thought, then glances back down at you. "And judging from last time, you didn't mind being in there, either~"

You blush furiously at the lewd thoughts those simple words and teasing tone conjured in your mind. You try to cover your face, but with your entire body in your partner's grasp, there's no way you can even hope to hide how quickly she got to you. She giggled.

"Heehee, I guess you really did love it. Don't worry, you'll get some alone time with my tongue later. For now, though, we should get you cleaned up."

You mumble out a 'thank you', still not entirely relieved of the memories you had, being pinned down and coaxed to completion by Buizel's tongue...

Eventually, she props herself up against one of the 'icebergs' and leans back, placing you front-side up on her cute, cream-furred belly. The warm water splashing softly against your legs works alongside the body heat of her torso and digits in soothing your tension, and you can almost feel your eyelids drooping; that is, until Buizel starts talking again.

"The ancient sea-faring Pokemon, name lost to time, spots a survivor fleeing from the wreckage of the ship. Unused to seeing other life, she assumed the passenger was a kindred spirit. He, too, was alone in the world..."

You crack a cheeky grin. "Oh, we're still doing this?"

"C'mon, at least play along a little!" she whispers angrily, trying and failing to hide her amusement at your usual banter. Her angry face is just adorable, so even though you were contemplating being a stick in the mud, you decided to relent.

"Okay, okay, I'll shut up until it's my turn to talk."

"You promise?" Buizel squints her eyes at you.

"I promise."

"Pinky promise?" she wiggles a finger against your torso.

You huff exasperatedly. "Yes, I pinky promise."

"You're not sticking out your pinky."

"You couldn't see it even if I did!"

"Fair point." she concludes, an amused smile on her face. "Now, where was I..."

"Right! The mysterious Pokemon from the depths of the ocean has found the stranded sailor far offshore. She rescued him from floating helplessly across the ocean, plucking his figure from the meager vessel. Then, she gently lifts him to her maw, placing him inside, giving him a momentary rest. There, he wouldn't have to hold his breath, or be put under the crushing pressure of the deep..."

It's really hard not to quip throughout that entire cheesy story, but you find yourself grinning anyway. Buizel's vocabulary was pretty impressive! Though that brings up the question of whether or not that's what she's actually saying, or if that's the berry translating her feelings instead of her prose, and lots of other things that you quickly decide you shouldn't think about, lest this whole situation get even more confusing.

"The ancient Pokemon dives deep into the ocean floor, holding her breath for many minutes while she returns to her underwater home. She softly lapped at her new tiny, curious friend, keeping him warm and...hydrated," she stops, then shakes her head, flushing up.

"Finally, she happens upon her retreat: a shallow sea-cavern, filled with an unnatural bubble of air that kept the brine from flooding the chambers. Pulling herself out of the water, she gasps for breath, letting the man in her maw get some fresh air, too. The sour tang of debris and other filth was constant on her tongue; the panic of the shipwreck must have dirtied him somehow! Compassion filling her breast, the massive beast carried her companion to another pool, this one tinted a soothing pink..."

You look down, noticing that the bathtub was, indeed, filled with pink water! How did she manage to sneak one of your bath bombs into the water without alerting you

"...she lays him down, resting him against her soft, beautiful belly, then reassures him of her intentions with powerful telepathy. 'I see you've dealt with a lot in the past few hours. Perhaps you'd like to freshen up in my bathing pool?'"

You smile fondly, still amazed by your partner's prose. "Y-yes, I would rather like that. I must thank you for your help in saving me from that shipwreck, Ma'am. I was in grave danger of wasting away."

Buizel beams down at you, loving how much you were getting into character. "Then let us begin."

Gradually, she began to nudge at your body, dipping you further beneath the surface of the colored water. Delicately scrubbing at your limp legs, submerged as they were, she began to remove the dried muck that covered your body. Her paws had a surprising amount of finesse; you've seen her handle objects with them before, but you underestimated just how much control she had over the muscles in her digits. They ground gently into your skin, massaging you in addition to cleaning the filth on you. You groaned in relief as you felt more and more of her touch, and nuzzled yourself into the palm of the paw holding you still.

"Mmhm, it's quite nice to have a guest that's so appreciative of his host's hard work," Buizel smirks, still very much enjoying the scenario she had made up in her mind.

"I-I-I, ah," you stammer, your concentration broken by the intense pleasure you're feeling from your partner's gentle ministrations. "I'm...very grateful, Ma'am. I haven't felt this, ah, intimate with someone in a long time..."

Buizel senses how hard it was for you to keep up, feeling pride at her roleplaying skills. "Oh, little one, don't speak if it troubles you. Just relax; let your gracious host smother you some more..."

You shudder at the way she talked; a vivid flashback of when she dangled you over her waiting mouth zipped through your mind. Sighing tiredly, you lean into the plush expanse of her stomach. It was getting hard to think about anything other than the expert massage she was giving you. You could sit here for hours, snuggling into her paw's gentle embrace...

Suddenly, you feel a sharp jolt of pleasure run up your spine. Buizel had been moving her fingers slowly up your shins, to your knees, to your thighs, rubbing each of your legs at a steady pace, leaving your mind blank and blissful. It was natural that she'd pass by your waist, but that didn't make it any less titillating. With one calculated thrust forward, she managed to get you erect nigh-instantly!

"Hehe, my guest flatters me," Buizel chuckles, obviously pleased with your body's reaction. "Well, we can't just leave your little friend unattended, can we?"

You lurch, gasping in surprise as your partner suddenly clasps two of her digits over your throbbing member and gets to work. Even with the threat of water splashing against your face and choking you, your arousal isn't dampened a bit. Her orange digits retain their soft, fuzzy texture, the natural oil her pores produce keeping her fur from getting wet. With a fervent grip that almost seems trained, she elegantly strokes you off.

Your mind swirled, taking in the world that your partner created...it all felt so real! It only took minutes for you to reach your breaking point; entranced as you were, there was nothing you could do to prevent yourself from blowing your load. The delicate clutches of Buizel's paws inevitably coaxed it out of you, and you came ecstatically into the water of the bath.

"Mmmh..." she hummed lustfully. "I accept your tribute, human. I only regret that you couldn't have given it to me more...inimately~"

In the resplendent afterglow, you showered your partner's paw with kisses, showing your appreciation to her the best way you know how. In response, she chuckled and lowered your body ever-so-slightly deeper into the sparkling bathwater. She began to stroke your chest, rubbing some of the grime off of your torso and arms, too. After she felt you were decently clean, she flipped you over and did your back. You sunk even more into the softness of her belly as she worked out your kinks in addition to washing you. Finally, she left you to wash your head of the muck, which took some concentrated effort on your part. Dry saliva (and more unspeakable body fluids) was a real annoyance to remove, but coming from Buizel, it was always worth it.

After you were cleaned from head to toe, she set you down on an aqua ring she formed, allowing you to float like you were on a lifesaver. That was...a very intense experience. You never knew that roleplaying could be that fulfilling!

Buizel looked down at you, then smiled and turned away demurely. "So...did you like it?"

"I LOVED it!" you shout, pumping your fists into the air. Though you were fairly tired from your climax, your exhaustion was far outweighed by the excitement you felt. Buizel just shared something very intimate with you, something she couldn't truly show you without being able to talk to you; you owe it to her to let her know how much you enjoyed her little game.

"Great! I always wanted to do this with you," she beams hopefully at you. "If you don't mind...could we do it again sometime?"

"Absolutely! I call dibs on the scenario, though."

She huffs childishly, a bit miffed at the suggestion. "Oh, alright. You better think of something good, though!"

"Already on it."

"We should probably get out of this bath before you get pruney and I get wet."

"Yeah, probably."

What's in store next?
113121121212121.title: Roleplaying with a Giant Otter

choices: "...Why don't you show me who you were talking to earlier?"
Before she can finish, Buizel dashes off towards the house!
1131211212121212.content:
Once you both got out of the tub, and had dried yourselves off thoroughly, Buizel didn't wait long to present a certain question. A question that was a whole lot more important than the casual inquiry about your breakfast that it appeared to be on the face of it. She didn't pin you down with it, though, merely sending it out there as she made her out out of bathroom, giving you ample time to think things through.

There were countless different factors swaying you from one side to the other: from the possible ramifications of you becoming the local hermit of your community, to the fact that some berries to go along with your breakfast didn't sound all too bad... From the possible dangers of being so small in the great outdoors, to the idea of not being able to understand Buizel's speech anymore...

That last thought particularly got to you. After just having experienced what felt like the height of pleasure her voice as you were perceiving it could bring you, it was almost impossible for you to imagine going back to only hearing her own name, even as it had been such a set-in-stone norm for so many years.

"Well, we're at the crossroads... What're ya thinking?" she asked, bringing you up closer to her head. You noticed that she was standing in the living room, equal distance from both the kitchen and the front door.

"I..." Your voice caught in your throat, the syllable escaping you before you even had an answer. "I.... I think it would be, uhm... nice to go berry-hunting with you..."

Buizel couldn't hide her smile as it slowly grew on her face, a light hum resounding from her form: one that was even easier to detect when she suddenly hugged against the upper part of her chest! "Then let's get out there already~"

- - - - -

You didn't quite realize how much you were in need of some time outdoors until you were basking in the sun's warm rays, and taking in some fresh air with every breath. That much seemed like it was always true -- you were far from the most active trainer around, and certainly not the type to stay outside all day looking to battle -- but you found this berry-hunt had already been particularly refreshing what with the plethora of relieving sensations it offered you. The heat of the sun balanced out by a crisp breeze, the pleasant sound of gently swaying leaves and a calm river's flow, the sweet smells of thriving plant-life: it all came together to be just as invigorating as it was relaxing.

Buizel was feeling pretty relaxed herself. She hadn't yet been able to find any of the exact berry she was looking for, but she was already feeling good about her haul on the whole. If she hadn't been in search of a special, bluish-purple type of berry, and more importantly, if she didn't have you with her, resting on the top of the repurposed picnic basket she was carrying, she probably would've called things already. But every moment spent out here with you felt special, so as long as she had a great excuse to keep going, she was content with idea of foraging for hours more.

You would probably take some issue with that idea, though, not because you weren't having a pleasant time, and certainly not because you were having second thoughts about staying shrunk, but rather... because your hunger was starting to become a bit of an issue, especially now that berries were the main focus of your conversation.

"Y'know, we could just come back out after breakfast and try again... I'm sure there's still plenty of time before I grow back," you eventually called up to her, stomach letting out a little growl.

"You sure you don't want to just munch one of the berries in the basket for now? Trust me, those yellow ones are really good!"

You pursed you lips, quite skeptical of that claim. "Mm, I don't know if I trust your judgement after you hyped up that one orange lumpy berry that ruined my taste-buds for, like... a whole week."

"Oh, you're just a baby when it comes to spicy stuff! Besides, you like Cheri berries, don't you?"

"Yeah... Cheri berries are okay, I guess..." you murmured, having gotten a taste of them more recently than she could ever know. "Pretty sure you've already picked this entire route clean of those, though... if the pantry at home's any indication."

"Hey, don't shame my vices! I just know what I like~”

You couldn't help but chuckle, soon noticing that Buizel had stopped in her tracks, sights set on nothing in particular.

"Hmm, but alright, we can go have breakfast first..." she said, starting the trek back back home. "Sooo...what are ya hungry for today? Some panc-- EEP!"

Buizel yelped when her left foot didn't meet the ground, getting crammed into a foliage-covered crevice. Instinctively, she assumed a death grip on the basket's wicket handle, knowing that letting the basket tumble with you on it could be a potentially disastrous slip-up.

"Are you okay?!"

"Y- Yeah, I'm fine... there's some kinda..." Buizel freed her foot-paw, peering down into the hole. "...Whooa, no way!"

"What is it?"

Buizel took you in her right paw, bringing you close to the burrow. You were shocked at what you saw, finding you had to a do a double-take for the sight to even register. "It's a bunch of those berries! They were all right here this whole time!" she chirped.

Without a second thought, she started nabbing up the berries with her free hand, dumping them all in the basket excitedly. If it was you in her position, though, you'd probably be a little bit more hesitant. "This feels... too good to be true."

"Ehh, best not to question fate, y'know? This sets us up for weeks!"

"I guess," you mumbled, still feeling a tad wary. "....Let's just go have some breakfast."

"Sure thing!" She closed the basket and hoisted it up with one paw -- you safely cradled in the other -- and a started making her way to the house with no more hidden burrows to trip her up. "You feeling pancakes today?" she asked, now able to get the question fully out.

"Yeah. No syrup or anything, though... I don't want my entire body to get sticky."

"Mm, don't pretend like you've got a problem with getting sticky now~"

A blush flared up at your cheeks, unconcealable even by the hand that you sent towards you face. "C- C'mon, that was a reach... We're talking about breakfast syrup here!"

Buizel only giggled in response, clearly getting a lot of amusement from seeing you wound up. Maybe she did feel a little bad, though, one of the giant orange digits nestling you starting to rub the top of your head, almost apologetically. Slowly, you slumped back in Buizel's hand, feeling a wonderful sense of comfort wash over y--

"Hey!"

A powerful, feminine voice suddenly sounded out, freezing Buizel's stride and launching your heart up to your throat.

"You, Buizel! Any idea where my stash of berries got off to?"

Buizel brought her head down in an instant, inches from your form. "Stay quiet..." she whispered in a single breath, opening the basket and depositing you inside. It was an easy instruction to follow, at least as long as your throat felt so utterly stopped up, but that did little to abate your spiked nerves. The gloomy dimness that set in around you when Buizel closed the basket only made things worse, light reaching your newfound confinement as mere shreds peeking through the wicker.

"You'll have to be more specific," Buizel called before she even looked back to the source of the voice, and when she did, any amount of confidence she had tried to muster up was stolen from her.

Oh Arceus... A Lucario?!

Standing just a bit aways from Buizel was the powerful final evolution, partly dimmed by the shadow of a tree with a cold, hard-to-read expression. "The hole here I had stuffed with berries just a few hours ago. The purple ones... The ones I spent hours hunting down..."

Buizel could no longer bring herself to be coy, slowly rediscovering her voice. "I- I didn't know they were yours."

The Lucario's left eye pinched up, seemingly more out of skepticism than annoyance. "You found a stash filled with exactly one type of berry... and you didn't think that they maybe belonged to someone else?"

"Well, what do you even need them for?" Buizel quickly shot back, unconsciously taking the basket into a tight hold .

"To eat. What else?"

Buizel's sights fell to the ground, foot-paws shifting beneath her "...I know that's not true."

"Oh? ...And how's that?" The Lucario questioned, voice carrying a condescending lilt.

"Because... If you eat them you'll probably shrink. They're not normal berries... A- And you clearly know that, or you wouldn't have hoarded them."

A smirk gradually appeared on the Lucario's muzzle, clear as day even as it was half-obscured in shadow. "Mmm, I have to say, I never took you for that kind of Pokemon. You've always come as an innocent little forager to me... Never would've guessed you had... ulterior motives."

Buizel felt the blood drain from her face at those words, not liking a single thing about what they implied.

"Don't worry, though, you're in good company..." she continued vaguely, slowly making her way closer. "In fact, how about we make a deal, one self-invented goddess to another."

"L- Look, I'll give you all the berries back, okay? Just-"

"Oh, I don't really mean a deal like that. Perhaps calling it a... repayment would be more apt... After all, I'm not just gonna let a little thief like you off scot-free. Especially not one so... interesting."

Buizel's heart was pounding in her chest, so strong that you felt it resound through the inside of basket as she held it tight against her form.

"So..." The Lucario started with a note of finality in her voice, now only a few feet away...
1131211212121212.title: A Berry Bad Confrontation

11312112121212121.content:
The second those words came out of Lucario's mouth, you could feel your partner balk and freeze up. You were too busy getting jumbled around with the berries to do the same, so you just let the dread of this new Pokemon's presence wash over you. Was she bluffing? Or did she have some way to detect your figure, even from inside the berry basket? Buizel was thinking much the same, yet as she deliberated, an awful realization dawned on her:

'Wait, all Lucario have the ability to sense auras! Of course she could see him!'

Buizel gripped the handle tightly. She hated the thought of putting you in danger more than anything else, but keeping you in the basket now would be doing exactly that. With no small amount of reluctance, she took her free paw, opened the lid obscuring you from the outside world, then carefully picked you out between the various berries you were trapped beneath. You know in your heart that she wouldn't throw you to the wolves (literally, in this case) just to save her own hide, so you don't resist when she lifts you up for this seedy stranger to see.

Lucario beams frighteningly as she catches the sight of your puny form within Buizel's fingers, and instantly, you could tell why she didn't attempt to fight back or flee; it was those bone-chilling eyes, the ones that seemed to bore through your very soul. From that one glance, it seemed obvious that she did not regard you--or anyone like you--in any way, shape, or form as anything other than a toy for her to entertain herself with. Subconsciously, you burrow yourself deeper into your partner's palm.

"Ah, so my intuition was correct, then?"

"Y-you know that I know that wasn't a guess," Buizel mutters, squeezing you protectively as she notices the lone wolf's gaze. Lucario only scoffed in reply.

"Hmph. Guilty as charged. I could see the both of you the moment you stepped near my Faleli berry stash. The only thing that kept me from knocking you out the second you touched it was the tiny human you have there."

Your partner only grips you tighter to her chest in response. Even amidst the dreadful beating of her own heart, she could feel your own as strongly as hers. Instinctively, she presses her thumb over your head, stroking you in a vain attempt to calm you down. That's not to say it wasn't comforting, just that the terror of the situation made it impossible to do so.

"Oh, did you think I was going to steal your little toy?" the aura-sensing Pokemon chuckled, "I'm sorry to have worried you. I wouldn't dare insult a fellow self-made goddess like that."

As soon as she mentioned the word 'goddess', you felt your heart skip a beat. Both in embarrassment, knowing deep down that you truly enjoyed the control Buizel had over you, and dread, knowing this canine probably had a tiny human herself. One that, you'd suppose, didn't have nearly as much say over what happens to him as you do.

Your partner's face hardened at the way this Lucario dismissed you. Not once in her (admittedly long) list of fantasies about shrinking you down did she ever want you to consider yourself lesser than her. Sure, she might've had less than savory dreams about how to use you, but every time, you were a willing party in the exchange. A pang of guilt runs down her spine as she tries to ignore the thought she inevitably worried about. All this pressure made it hard to think straight. One thing's for sure, though; she wasn't going to stand for this!

"Look, I'm sorry that I took your berries, but I'm not going to sit here and let you treat my trainer like he's nothing! What kind of monster would ever consider their partner as a toy?!"

The Lucario shook her head, her disappointment palpable in the air. Just when she thought she found a kindred spirit...

"I am not keen on being talked down to by someone, Pokemon or not, that hasn't the patience to hear me out," her scowl deepened. "Not only are you soft, you're presumptuous, too. No matter how much I made it perfectly clear something was wrong with how I lived, he never listened. There was no respect in our relationship," she paused, then gave Buizel a sinister leer, "That is, until I used this fruit to make him assume his true role, at my beck and call. Even at his puny size, I can make use of him in...other ways~"

Buizel shivered, already getting a good idea of what this Lucario did to her shrunken trainer. "Y-you didn't..."

"Yes, I most certainly did," the canine rolled her eyes, then shot your partner a knowing look. "And don't play coy. I can sense those desires in your head, you know. They're very intense. Did you not do the same thing to your own puny human?"

Buizel cringed at that. She did shrink you without your permission, and disguised it as something innocuous. She even used you for her own pleasure--though unlike Lucario's trick, this one was meant to be mutual. That didn't make it any less of a violation of your trust and safety, though. Bile crept up in her throat as she revisited the delusion that you weren't going along with her games of your own free will...

...you could easily pick up on this, knowing how prone she was to thinking she was coercing you. It killed you inside to think she really trusted herself so little; and so, you decided to return the favor, wrapping your arms as firmly as you could around her digits and rubbing them with all your strength. For what it's worth, you could feel her pulse calm down a bit.

But...that doesn't really solve the problem, does it? The problem being this nosy canine that's making your precious Buizel relapse! The way she's planting these misplaced seeds of doubt right back into her head makes your blood boil. How dare she hurt your partner?!

Having worked yourself up, you push your head out of the grip of Buizel's paw, then attempt to give that no-good Pokemon a good chewing out; an attempt that fails the second you open your mouth. Lucario glares at you with a look that could kill, her very gaze a veil-less threat. You immediately freeze up, body acting of its own accord.

"Who gave you the permission to speak, worm?"

That snapped Buizel right out of her self-loathing trance. She might be unevolved, but she's not just gonna let this...this bitch talk down to you like this!

"Don't. Talk. To. Him. Like. That."

Lucario...
11312112121212121.title: Caught Orange-Handed

113121121212121211.content:
Instead of getting angrier, like you'd think, the Lucario actually stopped. Her eyes were wide; she seemed shocked...and a little impressed, even!

"Hm. I wasn't expecting such a strong response from you, girl. There might be something more to your petty words."

The canine closed her eyes, putting a paw up to her chin in thought. She hadn't foreseen the kind of fierce protectiveness Buizel held for you. She didn't react like you were a plaything, or a pet, or even a lesser being. This was compassion one could only hold for an equal; and a close one, at that. Regardless, she had still done wrong by stealing those Faleli berries. You two weren't off the hook just yet.

"Fine. I won't disparage your little human anymore. However. You still owe me for attempting to steal from my stash," she stated, clearly still interested in that spunk from before. "So, I wish to have a talk, of sorts. If you manage to justify your lenient treatment of someone so literally beneath you, then I shall let you go. I may even allow you to keep some of the Faleli berries, if you impress me enough."

Buizel grimaced, knowing she didn't really have a choice in the matter; it was either entertain Lucario or keep you in danger. Sighing, she loosened her grip on you, making it much easier to breath. Still, she rubbed your belly absentmindedly. It helped her think better. That, and the way you cozied up to her fingers was ridiculously cute...

"Okay. How do you want me to start? Any questions you have in particular?"

The canine smiled playfully. "Absolutely. First off, when I read your aura earlier, I detected your desire to dominate your trainer. Not only that, I picked up that you've done so, multiple times already. What is the difference between your actions and mine? What, exactly, makes me so vile in your eyes that does not also apply to you?"

Buizel's eyes lit up. This was easy! Maybe this wouldn't be as tricky as she thought...

"Well, the main thing that makes us different is the trust I share with my trainer. Every time we, uh," she pauses, blushing a bit at having to explain her sexy times with you, "pamper each other, we always make sure we both want it. From what I'm hearing, you don't do that with yours."

Lucario chuckles at the bizarre euphemism your partner came up with. "That's not true at all! I can read his aura, don't you know? He always, hehe, lets me know what he wants. He's probably hornier than your own puny trainer!"

That earned a blink from both you and Buizel. Certainly, she wasn't thinking in the same terms as you were. Right?

"I'm afraid I don't get what you mean. What do you mean, he 'lets you know what what he wants'?"

The canine rolled her eyes again. "Oh, don't play dumb. You know exactly how! Sometimes I don't even need to read him; his body lets me know just the same."

A deep revulsion spread in Buizel's chest. That was the same line of thinking she'd caved in to when she first put you in her mouth. Yeah, it might've resulted in you and her being closer, but it was stupid and rash and hasty and could've made you hate her forever--{/i]

"You should know better than that! I can't sense emotions, and even I know that's not how it works! Couldn't you tell he was scared? Anxious? Terrified, even?"

"Bah. Sure, he was a little scared, but that doesn't matter in the end, does it?"

"OF COURSE IT DOES!" Buizel shouted, "How would you feel if someone messed with you like that without asking?

Lucario only raised an eyebrow. "Why are you asking me how I'd feel? Isn't it normal to spring these kinds of things on someone?"

"No! Well, in some cases, yes, but that's after you trust each other like me and my trainer," your partner replies, caressing you more softly. The stronger Pokemon's words had stirred some self-conscious in her actions.

"Hmph. If that's the case, he certainly didn't let me know," Lucario muttered, brow furrowed at the notion that what she did was apparently 'taboo'.

"Wait," Buizel interjects, "What do you mean by that? Did he do anything...'scary', to you?"

"Yes, as a matter of fact. Whenever he'd come home from work, he'd hug me from behind and tickle my belly until he was sated. It felt nice, in a way, but even if I wasn't having it, he'd just keep on going until he got bored."

"Oh. That's...pretty messed up. Hey, did you get physical with him?"

"No. I still hadn't realized how phony the whole thing was. Now I know it was a mistake to hold back; my power would have easily sufficed to stop him in his tracks," Lucario pauses for emphasis, "There's the rub: power. He used to have it over me, keeping me in a ball, as well as that awful, subservient mental state. Now, I hold it freely. Anything I want him to do, he does."

Both you and your partner share a pang of sympathy for the Pokemon in front of you. The picture of how she got to this state was a lot clearer now. Her trainer might be a jerk, but you two know better than to attribute malice to something that could be explained by ignorance.

"I...don't think that was the lesson to take from your experience, Lucario."

Lucario breaks from her trance, giving the both of you a quizzical look. "Oh? How so?"

"Well," Buizel pushed her tongue against her cheek, trying to word this correctly, "You're right that power was a strong dynamic in that situation. But the problem is, that isn't the only thing at play; there's also something called consent. Your trainer wasn't right to tickle you against your will; he should have known you weren't enjoying it, and stopped. Even if he did have power over you, it was neglectful at best and malicious at worst for him to keep doing it."

She blinks, then bounces back through the conversation a bit. "Of course, that isn't to say that him making you uncomfortable was something he did on purpose. Or that any of the bad things he did were intentionally malicious. He might not have been able to tell just how much you disliked his tickling, or the ball, or your general lifestyle. I don't want to pressure you or anything, but it'd probably be a good idea to talk to him about this, now that he can understand you."

Lucario was stunned. She hadn't expected such a thorough argument from this small, unassuming Pokemon in front of her, yet here she was, feeling conflicted for the first time in quite a while. It wasn't enough to totally shake her to the core, but it put a crack in her wall, that's for sure.

"Sure," she muttered, still somewhat wide-eyed, "I might do just that."

For a while, Buizel and Lucario just stood there, occasionally moving their gazes away from the scenery, only to stare awkwardly at each other, then look away again. The former, now feeling comfortable with holding you out in the open, simply sat you in her palm and started massaging your back with a singular digit. Both of your hearts were still racing from the tense conversation and disconcerting revelations she had with the latter. Their paces slowed as everything seemed to work out, though.

It was your partner who broke the silence. "If we're finished here, I'll just, uh, give these berries back--"

"N-No, it's fine," the canine murmured, staring at the intimate display of affection Buizel was giving you, "You can keep them. Just...leave a few for me, will you?"

"Got it."

The whole unbearably tense meeting with the intimidating Lucario ended with your partner tossing five or six of the ten Faleli berries she'd nabbed from the stash right back into it. The only thing exchanged before you two rushed back home was a goodbye and a strangely shy wave...

Whose story do you follow?
113121121212121211.title: Buizel Convinces Lucario!

choices: “... lay down, and place me on your belly?”
1131212.content:
When she looked down, she then gasps softly, as she seems shocked that you were really her master, shrunken, but still real, not someone else.

“Oh... my...” She spoke in a melodious voice, as she cast a worried look on you. “Are you okay, master? I’m so happy that you aren’t hurt.”

“You... can talk?” You ask her, expressing your surprise in both facial expression and voice tone.

“I... I don’t know what happened.” She tells you, as she gives you a sympathetic look. “When I found you here, you were already like this, and you just came to conscious. It was a good thing that you left me out of the ball to accompany you, or else there would be problems.”

“Yeah...” You said back, the word drifting off. “This isn’t really good, is it?”

“Unfortunaltely no. I’m so much bigger than you, that I’m scared I might accidentally hurt you.” She told you truthfully with a fearful look in her eyes. “I really don’t want to hurt you as you are.. But I don’t know where to put you...”

You search your mind for a idea, and soon, you come up with one.

“Could you...”
1131212.title: Taken care by a gentle Buizel.

choices: You decide to give the Buizel’s footpaws a little fending. (Writer’s stream.)
You decide to take a trip through her reproductive system (Reader’s choice)
11312121.content:
“...put me on the ground?” You ask her. “I don’t feel quite safe being held up that high. I’ll be safer when I’m on stable grounding.”

The feminine Buizel accepts your request with a nod, as she lowers her paw on top of the ground, so that you could get off.

As you get off, she raises her paw, as she then sits down on her bottom, as she looks at you with care in her eyes.

“So... what can we do?” The female Buizel asked. “I don’t think that you’re going to be back to normal until later, my trainer.”

As you consider it, you take a look at her body, every foot of the cute and beautiful orange glory that sits before you.

You notices that the Buizel has exposed most of her bare body to you, as you see that her own privates were within reach to massage, or even enter, if you so desired.

Actually, that’s not a bad idea. You never did learn much about Pokemon anatomy, back when you were learning. How about you take a hands-on approach in learning the reproductive system of a weasel-like Pokemon like Buizel.

On the other hand, equally tempting, you see that her footpaws were in view. Her three-toed feet, which were a little pushy on the toes, and had cream-like circles on her soles and toes, in place of paw-pads, were covered with a little dirt.

Somehow, you feel like that you should give them a little attention. After all, the feet are the parts of any being that need the most care, with all the work they have to do:

After thinking for a while...

You ask knowing that she has something with this, she wrap her hand around you and lift you to her face "I was just testing my shrink gun on you-" she was cut off by you, "wait you can talk!?" you ask in shock, there was silence for a few minutes before she spoke again "yes I can talk...anyways...you will be back to your normal size in two or three days, but for now...

She take you back to your bedroom and jump on the bed with you, she give you a warm hug before place you on her belly "good night cutie" you blush a bit as she said, after some minutes she felled asleep you decide to...

choices: She brings you up to her mouth
She doesn't do anything and you're able to fall asleep
11322121.content:
The light snoring of your Floatzel filled the dark bedroom. You were slightly miffed at the fact she shrunk you and immediately decided to have a nap but then again it wasn't so bad. It let you compose yourself better as you took in the extreme size difference between you and your sleeping Pokemon. Her belly was like a rolling sea of cream and orange fur as she gently snored in and out. Thankfully you were small enough that you couldn't easily fall off her rounded stomach and even then two large yellow tubes would catch you if you did.

Floatzel's fur was always very soft and impeccably clean which made her great for cuddles but now that you've been shrunken you were curious what it felt like to be able to sleep in it. Laying down on your back you stretch your limbs throughout her fur and feel yourself sink into it. You let out a contented sigh as you savor the warmth of her body heat and the soft hairs tickling your bare body. However, your movements seemed to have stirred Floatzel in her sleep. You let out a shocked yelp as you see a large paw suddenly appear over you and rush down towards your body.

Thankfully, the impact wasn't that hard but you were very lucky you weren't hurt. It reminded you that with such an extreme size difference she could very well break you if she isn't careful. Right now that fact didn't worry you, any anxiety you felt soon fading as you relaxed under her paw and let the warmth envelop you. Well, you might as well sleep as well at this point. You let yourself sink further into her fur and relax. Soon your eyes start to feel heavy and you start to drift off... Until you hear a certain noise.

It was a wet noise that was coming from her mouth. You paled as you remembered a certain bad habit Floatzel had. Ever since she was a Buizel she had a habit of suckling or chewing on things when she was sleeping. Many times when you stayed up with her and watched a movie you would look over and see her unconsciously munching on a pillow or even your hand after she fell asleep. It was pretty cute even if it did ruin some cushion coverings.

Right now though it was anything but cute. Turning your head to look at her face you could see her lightly opening and closing her mouth, giving you a glimpse of her sharp, white teeth. The fact that her digits were wrapping tighter around you also did nothing to alleviate your anxiety, they were gripping you tight enough to keep you trapped in her paw!

"Floatzel?" You nervously call out to her. She only restlessly dragged you a short distance up her belly in response. If she does decide to use you as a chew toy the best case scenario was that you could try and wake her up when you get closer to her face. The worst case, you get put in her mouth and possibly eaten. You hope it didn't come to that, though.

114.title: Chikorita family

choices: You'll never know, because the cause of the light appears to snatch you away!
1141.content:
The light fades, and when you can finally see again, it's obvious that something is wrong. You are still sitting on your couch, but you have shrunk significantly, and you guess you're just a few inches tall now. And to make matters worse, your Chikorita is standing on the couch right before you.

The Grass-type Pokemon is not looking at you, though. She's glancing around, with a confused expression on her face. Apparently, she's looking for the source of that light. It seems like she wasn't the cause of it. But then what was? And how did it make you shrink?

The Chikorita lets out a sad cry, and then finally looks down at you. You stare up into her enormous red eyes, each bigger than you are (although Chikorita tend to have very big eyes in the first place), and stand frozen with fear. Sure, this Chikorita is yours, and is friendly, but at your new size, will she still see you as her friend?

You'll find out soon. The Chikorita extends a vine from the back of her neck, and you watch as it snakes towards you. It reaches you and begins to loop around your torso, deftly coiling you up from chest to waist and pinning the arms you forgot to move out of the way. Instinctively, you squirm against the tight grip of the vine, but it's useless. The Chikorita hoists you into the air and up to her face, bringing you within inches of her gigantic visage.

You don't squirm anymore. You're just overcome with awe and fear at the scale of your once diminutive Pokemon. And you're afraid of what she'll do to you, as she now has you in her grasp, under her control... Will she be nice like before, or will she turn mischievous?

115122.content:
While most children got their pokemon at age 10 where they then left on a pokemon journey you had gotten your pokemon at age 6. You found a young torchic in the woods all alone. The torchic was malnourished and seemed sickly so you took her back to your house and nursed her back to health. 6 years had passed and the torchic (who you named Ember) has evolved into a combusken and shows no sign of ever leaving your side.

1153221.title: Espeon or Umbreon?

11532211.content:
And so things had been a very normal day, or as normal as they got in the world of pokemon. You were a trainer, though at this point in life you had no specific goal, with only one pokemon as your partner you were not exactly in a hurry to try and catch them all, nor had you attempted the gym circuit in your own home town. Truth be told, you were just happy to be traveling. It was a great opportunity to see the world and broaden your horizons even if you didn't have any specific goal.

Your partner, was an espeon that had been with you since you were a little kid. You had hatched him from an egg and grew up together, and during your travels one day he had just evolved on his own to an espeon. You understood that there were many ways in which an eevee could evolve, and the espeon evolution was one triggered by happiness and trust with their owner, something you felt a little flattered about to learn your little eevee had thought that much of you. You supposed it had a pretty good life, you couldn't recall the last time you had recalled him to his pokeball instead letting him walk beside you everywhere and be out as often as he wanted. Most people seemed to see him as your pet since you weren't in a huge hurry to participate in pokemon battles or train him, and you supposed that was true to a certain extent. It felt weird to call him a pet though when he probably took care of you more than him. Sure, you could buy things when in the city, but he was always the one looking out for you in your travels out in the wild, dragging you out of harm's way when you didn't even see the beedrill nest in the tree you were about to walk into, or just doing simple things like making sure actually woke up on time. It had even found a few mundane utilities for its psychic powers such as telekinetically moving around dishes and plates to cook breakfast in the morning for you. If anything sometimes you thought that he saw you as his pet.

It was a late afternoon in this mostly normal day and you and espeon were currently exploring a market that was located underground the city. There weren't any official stores or chains in the market, instead it was more of a gloried garage sale where anyone who wanted to peddle anything could set up a stand for the day and sale whatever they wanted. Most of the stands sold about what you'd expect, hand me down clothes, old toys, and things that sellers assured you were antiques and could only go up in value at this point. Most of it was not that interesting, but there were two stores that looked interesting.

One of them was a stand run by an old man that had several TMs or Techincal Machines on sale. These could be used to teach pokemon new moves that they could use in combat, even if you weren't heavily focused on combat there was always the chance of wild pokemon encounters or the occasional trainer who just would not let you walk by them until you battled. It was always a good idea to have a few good moves to fall back on.

The others were run by a woman in a coat with thick glasses and seemed to sell various types of machinery. Honestly, you had no idea what they were as they just looked like blocks of metal with wires running along them, but it did look interesting.

The market was only open until about four in the afternoon though so at this point you only had time to check out one more stand.
11532211.title: Espeon

choices: You suddenly find yourself in strange place
115322111.content:
You decided that looking at the TMs was a better use of your time than a bunch of machines that you had no idea what they were. You worked your way over to the stand followed by espeon to look at the various disc.

"Ah welcome welcome!" The old man running the stall greeted you while rubbing his hands together. "Top of the line TMs at bottom prices. Just various defects in them where we weren't able to release them to the market?"

"Defects?" That didn't sound good. "Exactly what do you mean?"

"Ah, don't worry nothing major." The old man explained. "Basic things, you know all the discs come in different colors to indicate what type of pokemon they're for, for example pink for psychic types like your friend over there, well sometimes they'd come out say purple indicating it was a poison type instead and then if we sold it on the market trainers would get confused. Then others sometimes the labeling on the disc is corrupted where it can't be read, or you can't see the instructions on what move you're teaching once you turn it on. Basic things, they still work, but for obvious reasons we can't sell in normal chain stores, so I come down here about once a week and just unload some of them at discounted rates, seems a shame just to throw them all away."

That, actually made sense you had to admit, though you were a little reluctant to purchase a TM that you didn't even know what it was going to do. You looked around, preparing to leave but then noticed Espeon nudging one of the TM discs with a paw that he seemed to be really interested in. You picked it up to examine it, it was a gray disc, so probably a normal type move, at least if it was correct, the guy had said the colors were wrong on some of them. You looked at it to see if there was a label, or even a number. Nothing. Still, your espeon seemed to want it.

"How much for this one?" You asked.

"Huh well let me see." The old man grabbed it and peered at it for a bit. "Funny, don't recognize this one. Not sure what it is... Well, guess I'll just do it as a sort of grab bag special, maybe it's something great, maybe not, I'll give it to you for just 500."

You had a feeling you were being ripped off and it probably didn't do anything, but you looked down at your espeon who nudged you with a paw, they seemed to really want it, well it wasn't that much money.

"Alright, fine, you have a deal."

You purchased the mystery TM and left the market heading back above ground. It was quiet out not a lot of people were around. You started to think about what you were going to do for dinner, if it would be better to try to buy something or if you an espeon would be better off foraging for fruits and berries in the nearby forest. Your thoughts were interrupted though by espeon running in circles and jumping all around you.

"Whoa, easy boy! Calm down!" You bent down to look at him, and he nuzzled his head against you for a moment then looked at the TM you had purchased and were holding in your other hand. "You that curious as to what it does? Alright, we'll give it a try."
