Looked around, the blades of grass on the side of the sidewalk towered above you like trees and then you saw the cracks between different segments of the sidewalk. You could make it across them, but you'd likely want to jump rather than try to step over them.

The entire world was alien now, and staring down at you still was your own espeon who at this point was some kind of kaiju. The espeon seemed relieved to have rescued you from being lost in your own clothing but there was still the matter of the fact that right now you were...
1153221111222.title: Tiniest Trainer

choices: Have espeon carry you around the city
Have espeon take you to the forest
11532211112221.content:
You were only one inch tall. Talk about a daunting sight, your pile of abandoned clothes looked like a giant hill of fabric from where you sat on the sidewalk and your cute little espeon towered over you like some kind of kaiju monster. The entire thing was completely overwhelming and espeon didn't seen to be taking it much better. It was clearly worried about you and kept reaching out a paw to touch you then pulling it back scared that it might knock you over and hurt you.

"It's okay." You hear yourself tell espeon automatically. "I'm a little shaken up and not like you knew this would happen either."

Espeon seems to calm down a bit at this glad that you're not in any immediate Sanger and not angry with it. It sits down and stares at you for a bit then looks around at the sidewalk and.buildings. it's face suddenly shows concern for a bit and then it seems to get an idea. Espeon lays down as close to the ground as possible next to you to the point that it's muzzle is level with you. It takes you a moment to realize what it wants, and then you realize it's inviting you to climb up onto it. You have a sudden realization that at your new size someone could easily step on you without noticing and so decide to accept the offer. You grab a few handfuls of fur and pull yourself up onto espeon's muzzle. He seems to flinch slightly as you tug on the hairs but only till you're on his muzzle.

From there you work your way up and climb to the very top of his head and sit down directly between his ears. You realize snuggling up in espeon's head fur is actually quite warm and comfortable. The warmth you especially appreciate due to being completely naked thanks to your clothes not shrinking with you.

"Espee!" Espeon gives a happy cry once your on top then stands up bring careful not to dislodge you. Now he could carry you around and keep you 100% safe.

Still how safe were you here? Tiny and naked in a large city, maybe it'd be a good idea to tell espeon to get you out of here. There's a forest outside the city you two could find food in for the night and you wouldn't need to worry about running into other trainers or people. Of course if you stay in the city you could maybe look for the guy who sold glyph the TM and see if there's a way to reverse the shrinking. Then again just because you choose to stay in the city doesn't mean you have to seek out a way to reverse this. First it's probably best to decide where you want to go and then what you'll do there.
11532211112221.title: Inch High Trainer

choices: A normal-sized human tries to take Espeon!
115322111122211.content:
You’d probably be safer in the forest, but what were you going to do once you got there? You couldn’t just be tiny forever. You had to stick around town and find some way to return back to normal size. But first thing’s first, you had to get off the streets. Espeons were quite rare, and valued for their beauty and power, so you didn’t want your Espeon to get grabbed by some Pokemon trainer while you were too small to be fight back.

“Espeon, I need a moment to process all this,” you say. “Could you take us back home?”

Espeon nodded, and began trodding along the sidewalk in the direction of the apartment.
115322111122211.title: The City

choices: Espeon found a place for the two of you to relax
115322111122212.content:
You thought about staying in the city and possibly investigating a way to get changed back to normal but then you had a thought of what would happen once you encountered someone else here.

'Our eyes have met now we must do battle!' A random trainer tosses out their pokeball only to have it land on top of you before releasing the pokemon.

You shook your head clearing your mind of the vision. You weren't in a hurry to interact with other people right now, and wanted to go someplace that you and espeon could be alone and not have to worry about being stepped on, or knocked aside, or challenged to a duel against pocket monsters now hundreds of times your size.

"Espeon." You patted your hands against the top of it's head. "I think it's for the best if we get out of the city." With that you grabbed a few strands of fur with your hands to keep yourself balanced as espeon gave a slight nod indicating it understood and started walking.

Being able to ride around on espeon's head wasn't entirely unpleasant. It certainly beat walking yourself. At first you held on tight to its fur afraid you'd get thrown off, but once you realized that you were sitting pretty steady on his head with no actual danger of being thrown off you let go and relaxed a bit.

You looked over the side and saw as the sidewalk looked miles away beneath you. Lookg around it was strange, even on top of espeon's head you were lower to the ground than when you used to be tall, yet it still felt like you were being carried high through the air.

You were a little worried that someone might see a lone espeon walking around town, or worse see the tiny naked trainer atop his head. Luckily fortune seemed to favor you as the sidewalk gave way to grass and the two of you escaped the city without incident.

Here the grass was wild and uncut unlike the short grass in the city. Even there a single blade of grass had gone high over your head. Here in the forest most of the grass was up to your espeon's knees. To you they were like green skyscrapers reaching torwards the heavens, and you felt a sense of vertigo looking down at them. The trees throughout the forest were almost to large to comprehend, each one taller than a mountain with branches full of leaves larger than you. At one point, espeon moved under a tree with loose leaves and a single lead that had fallen from the tree landed on top of you.

Your vision was completely blacked out by the green foreign object and you couldn't see where espeon was going. Slowly, you crawled out from under it a bit surprised by it's weight. It wasn't hard to lift off you but it was like moving a heavy blanket. This gave you a bit of an idea. With some effort you were able to tear a strip of the leaf off. Upon doing this you wrapped the strip around your waist. It managed to cover from your waste to just below your knees allowing you a little modesty. It wasn't a full attire but with this leaf loincloth you felt a little less exposed now that you weren't naked.

But it wasn't long after this you realized espeon had stopped walking, that was because...
115322111122212.title: Forest of Giant Leaves

choices: Epeon, use your new attack on the spearow!
1153221111222121.content:
You look up and immediattely see the reason espeon had stopped moving. Standing in front of him was a wild pokemon, an ornery looking bird that you recognized as a spearow. Normally, such a pokemon would be of little concern to you, bur the spearow now is like an enormous monster in comparison to your now tiny size. Luckily, espeon is more than a match for it, and still taller than the bird.

"Speeeeeaaaaar!" The spearow took off from the ground flying as it tried to dive at espeon and hit it with a peck. You tried not to think about what it would feel like to be hit by by it yourself right now as espeon leaps into motion dodging the attack. The motion nearly throws you to the ground but you manage to grab a handful of fur and stay up on espeon's head.

The spearow flies back around in the air preparing to come back around for another attack. You really wonder what gets into some pokemon to make them attack like this.

Still, you can't stay on the defensive forever, best to give espeon a command and end this quickly.
1153221111222121.title: That's a Big Bird

11532211112221212.content:
There was one way to end this fight quickly. The new move espeon had used, the Minimize Beam. Considering it had shrunk you to just an inch tall this spearow would be much worse off and not be able to threaten you or espeon.

"Alright espeon! " You gave a shout. "Let's cut this bird down to size." Oh dear, punning, hopefully that wasn't going to be something your tiny mind would start doing often.

Either way your espeon got the message. You pressed yourself down against its head as it jumped out of the way dodging another attack from the spearow. Then, it took aim as the spearow turned around to come back at the two of you again.

For a brief moment, you made eye contact with the spearow, and you got the strangest feeling it hadn't even known you were there till now, as for a very brief moment it seemed to falter in it's flight.

Then, espeon fired it's attack. A beam of enery flew from it's forehead in a straight line right for the spearow, because of it'd earlier falter there was no chance for it to dodge
11532211112221212.title: Weaponizing the Minimize Beam

choices: Spearow is angry and ready to fight more
After that experience spearow would rather just fly off
115322111122212122.content:
Spearow is hit by the minimize beam and starts to rapidly dwindle in size. However, as it shrinks you see what resembles a light blue reflective surface in front of it. You recognize the attack, Mirror Move.

"Espeon!" You try to shout a warning, but it's to late. A beam of energy identical to the first beam is fired straight back at you and espeon. Espeon isn't able to get out of the way and both of you are caught in the blast.

Espeon doesn't seem to change much from your point of view, both of you shrink at the same rate meaning that you're able to stay up on his head. However that leaf loincloth you were wearing suddenly starts to get really heavy as it doesn't shrink with you. Soon, it's easily large enough to cover you and you're caught underneath the piece of leaf unable to see what's going on.

Espeon thrashed around for a bit, and you stay on top of it by gripping it's fur. It stops thrashing after a moment, perhaps rememberingyou were on top of it, but you can feel it's entire body tense underneath you.

Espeon shakes it's head a bit to get the torn leaf you had been wearing off of it. When you can see again, a number of things startle you. The world is enormous, blades of grass that had gone up to espeon's knees now towered high above both of you stretching away into the sky as if forever. You couldn't even see the trees anymore beyond the sea of grass from your current vantage.

If you had to guess, espeon was probably about half an inch tall right now, and then you were the same size in comparison to espeon as before you had been shrunk again. Your head spun as you tried to comprehend just how tiny you were. You doubt you could so much as drip a piece off a leaf to make an outfit this time.

You didn't have much time to think tough, spearow was still here, it had shrunk too, but only shrunk to an inch tall making it twice espeon's size. That was right, mirror move doubled the power of the move it reflected, you and espeon might be in trouble as the tiny giant bird looked at the two of you.
115322111122212122.title: Cutting Everyone Down to Size

1153221111222121222.content:
Sparrow squawks angrily and for a moment you think that you and espeon are done for. However the bird pokemon looks around in confusion clearly uncomfortable with its new shrunken size. In the end it decides not to continue the fight. Regardless of how angry it might be it doesn't want to stick around and risk getting shrunken even more. The sparrow takes off and flies away leaving you and espeon alone for now.

You and espeon wait for several seconds to make sure that nothing else jumps out at you. You can feel your heart throbbing in your bare chest as you try to calm down after that encounter. Espeon himself needed a moment to calm down. Sitting atop espeon's head you patted him on top as best as you could.

"I think we're safe now," you said. However you had a completely new predicament to deal with. Earlier when it had just been you that had been shrunken espeon was able to navigate the world normally. You could just sit on his head and leave everything to him. With espeon shrunken under half an inch tall, and you shrunken much smaller than that; things were a bit more difficult.

Each individual blade of grass that emerged from the ground towered like a skyscraper over espeon. From your point of view the grass might as well have stretched beyond the sky. Just getting above grass level was a dizzying impossible height.

The only good thing that came out of this was that the two of you might be beneath the notice of other pokemon now. Being considered to insignificant to even be bothered with by other living creatures sounded rough, but at least it meant you didn't have to worry about being attacked. At least you really hoped so. Still, what options did you have now? You doubted you could find your way back to town, and who knows how long it would take to get there. The forest might as well be an entire continent now.

"Espeeee," you hear espeon mutter. It sees he's quite nervous about being shrunken as well. You realize regardless of how bad things are you need to try to put on a strong face. It doesn't matter how tiny or insignificant you may be. You're still espeon's trainer! (Even if you're more of his pet now) You needed to let him know everything was going to be alright.

"Hey hey we'll be fine," you try to convince espeon as well as yourself. "This looks bad but we can make this work until we find a solution. First, let's just focus on the basic things we need for survival."

You thought for a moment about what that would mean. If you were going to survive this small the first thing you'd want to go look for would be...
1153221111222121222.title: Safe but Still Quite Tiny

11532211112221212222.content:
A growl from your belly decided for you. "I think we should look for some food, Espeon."

"E-Espeon..." the Pokemon mumbles as if to say "Easier said than done." He was right, at this size it would most likely take a lot of time and effort to actually find anything to eat at all. Cautiously, Espeon began slowly walking through the towering grass leaves towards nowhere in particular. That was all they could really do. Perhaps it would be better if you both found someplace to hide out. Maybe they would eventually grow back if they waited long enough?

As Espeon continued walking along you watched the trees swaying way up above you, the distance making the branches seem like clouds. Then an idea popped into your head. If you were in a higher vantage point you might be able to find food or at least come up with a destination rather than wandering aimlessly." Rubbing your hand on Espeon's massive head you call out to him."Espeon? Can you use Psychic on me?"

Espeon stopped in his tracks, "Esp?" He asked with a hint of confusion.

"If you use psychic on me and lift me above the grass I might be able to see something!" You explain. "And since I'm so much smaller than you I should be really easy to lift up, right?" Espeon mutters in thought as he thinks about your proposal. He had always used his psychic powers to nudge you out of harms way but never actually lifted you off your feet before. You could see a faint glow emanate from the jewel on the Espeon's forehead and you mentally braced yourself. Slowly you begin to descend, your hands and feet lifting away from your Pokemon's pink fur.

It felt like you were floating in water as you gradually rose, it was actually kind of relaxing. That was until the rate of your ascent started getting faster. As you rose higher you started getting vertigo as your body started to flip around, giving you a good view of the ground. At your size it was like you were 50 feet from the ground and you haven't even cleared the grass yet! It was only your Espeon's calm face that stopped you from panicking. Not a hint of worry was detected on his face as he effortlessly lifted you up higher and higher.

Before long you breach through the top of the grass. Blocking the apparent 200 foot fall from your mind you were struck with awe as you observed your surroundings. It was like a massive forest within an even more massive forest. Slowly rotating in the air you continue to take in everything your seeing. You see a small burrow at the base of a giant tree, a pile of fallen sticks and leaves and... Your jaw drops as you slowly rotate to see a gigantic blue mountain suddenly dominate your view. Staring at the smooth surface sprinkled with light dimples and a green crown on top you eventually realize it's an Oran berry! The monolithic berry was actually pretty close. In fact, this berry may have been claimed by the Spearow that attacked you earlier, explaining the aggression it showed towards you.

Calling down to your Espeon he slowly lifts you down until your safely sitting back down on his head. "There's a huge Oran berry just over there!" You say to your Espeon while pointing the way. "Lets go!" Almost immediately he turns and trots towards it, also keen on getting some grub. Unfortunately you underestimated how far away it was. Realistically it was just a few feet away from your position but at your size it the trek was taking forever. Slowing down to a walk even Espeon's belly was rumbling in protest. Thankfully you both could start to see the giant berry towering up above the grass.

Of course due to the size difference between you both and the huge berry you couldn't eat it as you normally would. With your Espeon placing a paw on its surface you could tell the skin would be tough to break through. You're nearly flung off your Pokemon's head as he suddenly swipes the berry with a set of claws creating a set of gashes in the fruit. After a few more swipes chunks of berry begin flinging off and a small morsel conveniently lands right in front of you. By small however, relative to you it was the biggest piece of fruit you've ever held. As you heft the fruit up you're surprised by the weight of the juicy flesh as you clutch it in two hands. Espeon too grabs a chunk from the eviscerated part of berry with his mouth and begins chowing down so you decide to do the same.

Before long you both have full bellies despite taking less than a bug Pokemon's portion from the berry. You both were cleaning the sticky juices off yourselves when the berry seemed to shift and rise away from you. You both look up in awe and fear as something extremely massive picks it up and starts eating it. As the berry ascends you're able to see what took it. What do you see?
11532211112221212222.title: A Food Source

choices: You were no bigger than a flea.
11532211112222.content:
Still shrinking, as if being an inch tall wasn't bad enough the effects of the TM still hadn't worn off and you were shrinking even smaller than that. You were already far smaller than any pokemon and at this point was getting worried that no one was going to see you. The sidewalk became rougher and bumpier as you got smaller, no longer a flat surface but instead seemed like a trying to cross a region of rocky hills, then there was the matter of the cracks between segments. At this point you wouldn't even be able to jump across them anymore than you could jump across a canyon.

Espeon bent low to the ground to get a good look at you as you shrunk smaller and smaller, you had to wonder what you looked like to the psychic pokemon. Could it even make out your body at all, or were you just a tiny dot to it. You waved your hands experimentally, and saw espeon blink, it seemed to be able to see some movement, so it could probably just barely make out the basic shape of your body, though you doubted it could make out much more than that.

"Are you able to hear me?"

Espeon turned its head, as if it heard something but wasn't sure what, so it couldn't make out your voice. You were going to really need to rely on its intuition for communicating at this point and found yourself very thankful it was a psychic type.

There was still the pressing matter of size difference though, and the fact at such a tiny speckish size you weren't exactly able to do much for yourself at this point. It was certainly concerning that....
11532211112222.title: Speck Trainer

115322111122222.content:
The shrinking still didn't show any sign of stopping, you were no more than a teeny tiny speck on the ground barely visible to your espeon but you were still getting smaller. Your espeon very slowly moved a paw near you very clearly scared of hurting you while you were so small but not wanting to lose sight of you, without thinking you grabbed a hold of a few fur strands on your espeon, though an individual hair was like a very thick tree branch at this point and getting to large for you to actually keep a hold on with your hands. You wrapped your arms and legs around a single hair that you assumed was on top of espeon's paw but at this point you were two small to see very far. You had managed to climb onto espeon's paw but now all you could see was an endless forest of pink hairs stretching up forever. Soon even with your arms and legs wrapped around a hair it was becoming difficult to hold on, the hair was wider around than an enormous red wood tree and you lost your rip, falling and landing somewhere on espeon's actual skin.

At this point, there was no chance of espeon being able to find you. Even if it could somehow see you at such a small size it would never be able to find you amongst all these individual hairs. Now, they were less like trees and more like giant skyscrapers. The base of each hair was the length of an entire city block in comparison to you, and if you could hollow one out you could probably make a rather spacious apartment inside one of the hairs to live in, of course that's a bit of a silly fantasy as you have no way to accomplish that.

You look around wondering what to do, wondering if maybe you should try climbing up further towards espeon's head. It would take a long time to get there, you'd have to somehow get up its leg, body, neck and to its head when each just walking between two individual hairs was like walking a full block, but it was some goal, maybe espeon would be able to hear you? Not likely, it was a psychic type though, could it sense you now, would it be easier to sense you once you had climbed up closer to its head? There was no telling but it was one possibility. You had to do something just to keep you mind off how small you were, invisible to the naked eye at this point you were microscopic, far small than an individual millimeter you were....
115322111122222.title: Microscopic Trainer

choices: Only a few dozen nanometers or so.
1153221111222222.content:
There was no reasonable way to process your exact scale at this point. You weren't even sure you were on the top of your Espeon's paw. You simply assumed that was the case, but in all likelihood you had climbed up from one of the lower hairs, and had simply worked your way onto a small wrinkle or indentation near the side or even bottom of the paw, even near the paw pad, possibly. You watched as the shrinking continued, and you didn't think for a single moment that it would slow down as of yet. If anything, you anticipated your shrinking coming to a sudden stop. When that happened, you thought, it might be like being in a car when it suddenly comes to a stop, resulting in a bit of whiplash from the acceleration. In this case, the all-over reduction coming to a stop, the rushing feeling of everything rising mightily over you, the pure sensation of everything becoming bigger and more powerful than your puny, shrinking, naked body...that stopping might be strong enough to knock you off your feet entirely. Possibly stronger, and you shuddered at the prospect of the powerful shrinking stopping sensation knocking you off the paw entirely. That would be scary, as you'd have no way to communicate or even so much as draw the attention of him.

Speaking of, the hairs on this paw were starting to appear quite a bit frightening and huge. Comprehending just how thin they were was getting to be a bit hard, since you were getting to sizes so small that you couldn't even run around the circumference of one within a minute. The grisly, intense, visceral detail up close this small, of the skin, of the looming, skyscraper-dwarfing, track field - circumference - rivaling hairs, and past the looming canopy of them, the blurry sky of events so large they defied your comprehension. You sat down, legs crossed, against a hair, still intimidated, and wondering when, if ever, you would stop shrinking.

All things considered, it wasn't...too bad. Your pink eeveelution was a good boy, and he certainly didn't mean anything wrong. If it were any other pokemon, certainly, you'd be frightened, but being on the foot, possibly underneath, of him? It wasn't that bad. If anything, aside from the prospect of shrinking out of existence, the idea of Espeon playfully shrinking you, maybe to a less extreme size than this, definitely had some appeal. At the moment, however, sitting to cover yourself as best you could to insulate your warmth, assisted by the body heat of the pokemon on the fast track to becoming your god, this was still a bit much.

You felt a rushing sensation. It was harsh, and the sheer accelerating force pushed you flat against the paw with no hope of getting up. It was crushing, even though it was just gravity and air rushing past you, and the surface you were being smushed against was normal skin, possibly softer. Since you couldn't move, you had some decent time to think about what it might be. You quickly came up with an answer: Espeon was moving his paw. Whether he was walking someplace, or putting you closer to his head remained to be seen, though you hoped it was the latter, so that you might communicate in some way with your looming, ultra gigantic pokemon. You would definitely need to have that talk, as you were starting to hit sizes where you thought you might start seeing particles.

After all, you were...
1153221111222222.title: Nanoscopic Trainer

1153222.content:
All right, you don't want a umbreon or an espeon.
How about vaporeon? Flareon? Jolteon?
1153222.title: Fire, Water, and Thunder

11532222.content: But what about Jolteon, Leafeon, Glaceon and Sylveon?
11532222.title: Flareon, Jolteon or...

115322222.content: Do you want Sylveon the fairy type evolution or Sinnoh eeveelution?
115322222.title: Sylveon or Sinnoh eeveelutions

choices: Well, she's actually a girl Sylveon.
1153222221.content:
You open your eyes. Just to notice you're no longer in your bedroom, sleeping in your cozy bed. You're in a dark forest. Everything is quiet around you. Scared, you start running, trying to get out of this forest.

Until suddenly you hear a small cry, coming from nearby. You turn your head as a Eevee suddenly jumps out of nowhere. It looks frightened. The small, brown creature quickly runs and hides behind you.

Not even a second later, a huge Raticate comes out of the same direction the Eevee came from. It looks at you, then at the small pokemon behind you, hunger in its eyes.

You don't know what to do. That Raticate looks strong, and it would be literally impossible fight you without any other pokemon. You consider running away.

But, on the other hand, you don't want to leave this Eevee to its fate. Ultimately, you decide to protect it from the Raticate.
The mouse pokemon growls at you, as if saying you to get lost. You don't move of an inch. You can feel the Eevee behind you shaking with fear.

And then, the big mouse jumps towards you, its fangs shining as it strikes...

~

Your eyes shut open, you let out a startled gasp.
"That... was just a nightmare..." you say, wiping some sweat from your forehead.
You notice you're on the couch, you must have fell asleep.

"Sy?" someone cries distantly, making you turn your head as a pink and white pokemon comes out from behind the couch. Two bows, one on its head and one on its chest, can be seen while two ribbon - shaped feelers come out from each ribbon.
Two baby blue eyes shine with concern. Concern for you.


Seeing your beloved pokemon, you smile. That wasn't a nightmare. That was how you met your loyal partner, Sylveon, many years ago.

The pink and white pokemon hops on your lap and looks at you worriedly. You start petting your partner's head softly. Sylveon purrs softly.
"You heard me gasp, didn't you? Is that why you're worried?" you ask. You get a small nod as a response. You chuckle.
"Don't worry Sylveon. I just had that dream again...".

~

Before continuing, what gender is your Sylveon?
1153222221.title: Sylveon

11532222212.content:
I’ve made her name Sage if that’s alright.

~

“Sy...” Sage coos quietly, looking down and then up again at your grim expression.
“But hey!” You say, making her ribbons and face perk up at you, your mouth widening into a grin. “It’s a new day, what do you want to do?” This peaks her interest, as your Pokémon jumps up off your chest and out your bedroom door. You sigh and follow, pulling the covers off of your figure and putting on some slippers.

As you peek around your door you see your Sylveon digging around in a loose floorboard near the kitchen. You slowly trudge up to her, and pet the fur on her back. “Whatcha getting?” You ask, trying to peer over her shoulder. Almost right as you say this, the pokemon’s head perks up in triumph, holding something and making you jump back in surprise. Sage turns around and you see that what she was getting was a glowing pink rock. She was holding it with obvious care, placing it in front of your feet, then staring up at you with a smile on her face.

“O-oh...Thanks Sage...Err, what is it?” You look at her, but she only pushes it closer to you with her nose.

“Sylveon!” Sage cries, nodding at the weird glowing rock, then back to you.

“Erm...okay..” You grab the space rock, and almost instantly you black out. When you wake up you see white trees all around you. You look around, and see your massive pokemon’s face in front of you! “AAH! Sage!” You scream in horror and confusion, staring at those baby blue eyes. As you look around a bit more you determine you are about...
11532222212.title: Lady Sage!

115322222122.content:
‘Half an inch?! That’s crazy!’ You think, Slowly looking back up at Sage’s massive muzzle. You stare at her face above you, your jaw dropped. It takes you about a minute before you’re able to collect yourself, and even then Sage helps by letting out a, “ Sy!” Her voice is so loud that you have to cover your ears as the “forest” shakes around you. Sage sees this, and puts a paw over her mouth, rocking your world.

“S-Sage!” You cry, not sure if your voice will reach her at this size. “What happened!”

“Sylve!” Sage purrs, reaching her immense paw to pluck you from her fur. As you look down, you see her stomach slowly getting smaller under you. The pokemon puts you on her neck and stands, causing you to stumble, but hang on almost immediately, knowing that if you fall, she might not feel you and accidentally step on you. “Sylveon!” Sage says, looking back at you and nodding. You get the point. Hang on!

Your world rocks as Sage starts to walk, making your hands sweaty, and tired. You hang on with all of your might, getting launched at s 90 degree angle at one point. Finally, your grip slips and you...
115322222122.title: A forest of fur

115322222123.content:
How about these?

(Smaller than these are a little much, so this is the smallest it can get)
115322222123.title: Smaller!?

1153222222.content: There the grass type evolution Leafeon or the ice type evolution Glaceon. Please choose.
1153222222.title: Sinnoh eeveelutions

11533.content: K, what about these two?
11533.title: Foxes

1153311.content: What gender will your Vulpix be?
1153311.title: Vulpix?

11533111.content:
So you're a lucky male trainer with a handsome male Vulpix!

Hmm, but where will you be with him when you shrink?
11533111.title: Male!

11533111221.content: So you're a male trainer with a male Vulpix. But what gender is your friend?
11533111221.title: At your friends house

choices: You begin to shrink before her
11533112.content:
“What a day…” You groan while stretching out comfortably upon your living room couch. After a long day of non-stop working, it felt heavenly to sit back and take a breather. As you release a long tired exhale, a sudden force slams down on your stomach causing you to jolt in surprise. “Huh!?” you stutter taken completely by surprised from the sudden feeling. As you gaze down at your abdomen, the sight of your Vulpix greets your eyes.

“You do know that it’s not very nice to jump onto other people’s stomachs, huh Flare?” You scold the vulpine Pokémon with a raised brow. “Hmph!” Flare grunts in an almost pouty like tone. “Anyone who manages to catch sight of my adorableness would think otherwise.” She retorts in a matter of fact tone. “Right.” You mutter with a roll of your eyes.

Flare and you did have quite a history together. In fact, she was the first Pokémon you ever managed to raise since childhood. Over the years, both you and her became practically inseparable, that is with the exception of school and work which caused you to leave your home along with her for a short time. Despite being rather mischievous and self-centered at times, she’s one of the most loyal Pokémon companions you ever had the liberty of caring for.

“So what brings you up here?” you ask as Flare casually sits upon your stomach. “Am I suppose to be your throne or something?” you ask in a sarcastic manner. “Yeah right.” Flare scoffs. “You’re way too skinny to be a throne.” She jokes with a smirk. “So, what’s the occasion?” you ask once more before noticing some strange small orb besides her front right paw. “What’s that?” you ask as Flare’s smile begins to grow ever so slightly.

“Oh nothing at all~” She says while daintily turning her head to the side and closing her eyes. “Well forget I ask.” You reply while nonchalantly shrugging your shoulders. “Alright alright!” Flare quickly stammers as a great amount of giddiness emerges on her face. “Do you know what this is?” she asks curiously while setting her paw on the tiny sphere, casually rolling it about. “Looks like some sort of circle.” You say in a blatant manner. “It’s not just any circle!” she beams as her head stretches out slightly towards you. “It’s a minimize berry!”

“A…minimize what?” you stutter with a confused brow raise. “A. Minimize. Berry.” Flare says, making sure to make small pauses between each spoke word to get her point across. “Oookay.” You reply, still confused by just how she managed to obtain such an item. “And just how did you manage to get this…minimize berry was it?” You ask. “Oh! You know. I did this and that.” Flare says nonchalantly while swaying her head side to side in a carefree manner. “Care to elaborate?” you ask, growing suspicious over just how she was able to possess this strange item.

“Okay, so I was spending time with one of my Clefairy friends.” She begins. “Since when did you have a Clefairy friend?” You ask, having no recollection of her ever hanging out with a fairy type Pokémon before. “I have friends out there you know.” She smirks with a slightly annoyed expression on her face. “So. Anyways, she and I were hanging out until we came across an Oran bush. Since we we’re both hungry we started to have out fill in DELICIOUS berries.” She smiles as if the memories of the delicacy brought great happiness. “And then she showed me this cool trip she developed.”

“A cool trick?” you ask growing slightly confused by where the story was heading. “Yup! She somehow managed to use her minimize ability on this berry here!” Flare beams enthusiastically. “Hold up!” you exclaim while raising your right hand. “What do you mean used minimize on that berry?” you ask gazing down at the delicacy still by her paw. “That Berry doesn’t even look shrunk at all.” You retort unsure if Flare was pulling your leg or not. “I wasn’t finished!” she retorts with a scowl and huff. “Anyways, she says whoever eats this berry will shrink in size for a certain amount of time.” She explains, only managing to increase your confusion level by a fraction. “So…this Clefairy friend of yours used one of her abilities on a berry that will make anyone who eats it shrink in size?” You recall, summarizing the whole story in just one sentence. “Yup!” Flare nods her head with a beaming smile on her face.

“And…just why do you happen to have that berry?” You ask, confused and uncertain about her unknown intentions. Without even answering, Flare quickly begins to wiggle her six tails against the sides of your abdomen, causing a burst of laughter to escape your mouth. “F-F-Flare!” you shout between bouts of breaths. As you struggle to get Flare off, an object suddenly ends up being propelled straight into your mouth. Momentarily dazed, you quickly rise up before instinctively swallowing the strange thing. With a gasp and hack, you quickly gaze down at Flare only to notice the berry gone besides her. As your pupils raise to Flare’s face, a huge smile was glued on her face as her six orange tails wag happily behind her. “this is gonna be fun.” She beams excitedly.
11533112.title: An unexpected playdate?

choices: Gonna play together inside the house!
115331121.content:
The first thing you become aware of was the fact that your mischievous little vulpix was suddenly starting to get heavier in your lap. Considering the explanation you had been given just moments ago it's not exactly difficult to find out why.

"Flare why!?" You coughed as you shouted, still clearing your thrown from having swallowed the berry whole so quickly. You realized that your feet were no longer touching the floor but were now dangling off the side of the couch. Your shoes had slipped off and your socks were hanging off your feet like big white hand towels in comparison.

"Cause it'll be fun!" Flare said with a smirk. "Just go with it and you'll fun too. Besides, it's only temporary." Flare suddenly paused for a brief moment and looked away. "Well, probably temporary."

"Wait what do you mean probably!?" You protested. Flare really was starting to get heavy. Your shirt and pants were also starting to get really baggy. Your socks decided it was time to officially give trying to stay on your dwindling feet and limply slid off and dropped onto the floor. After only a few moments you were no bigger than a child, with some very loose trousers staying on you by virtue of you sitting down and wearing a shirt that would probably go down to your knees if you stood up.

"Well I mean it was temporary when clefairy showed it off." Flare explained while she turned her head and preened her tails indignantly, as if she was insulted by your lack of trust in her. "I mean, we've never tested it on a human before so don't really know how long it will last or if it'll wear off. It'll be fine though." Suddenly her voice dropped as she talked as if she was really hurt by how you were acting. "Can't believe you'd be upset about it when I just wanted to show you something cool." You knew this pitiful act was one of complete lies! Flare was always mischievous and oftentimes if you didn't go along with it she knew how to do an epic pout until you went along with it.

But... she was just messing with you about the effect not being temporary. Right? Even she wasn't that mischievous? This would probably wear off in a little bit.

Right?

Right!?

You had no idea why you were so determined to convince yourself. The temporary or permanent thing was important, but so was the fact that you were shrinking right now and had a vulpix sitting on your lap who was now just as big as you were! And she was really, REALLY heavy now. She was less sitting in your lap now and now just kind of pinning your body from the stomach down to the couch.

"Can't... breathe." You complained as she continued to get heavier.

"Oh all right." Flare stood and stepped to the side of you on the couch. You pulled your legs out from underneath where she had been immediately, very happy to have that weight off of you. The moment you did your pants slid off the side of the couch. You had less been wearing them by this point as you had just happened to have them on top of you and held up by Flare being on top of them.

You now had more than enough room to stand up on the couch. As you did your shirt nearly slipped right off you. The neck hole was easily large enough for your shoulders to slip through. You tried to catch the edges of the fabric, but your hands couldn't really reach through the sleeves anymore. Instead you were forced to grab the shirt from the inside. Grabbing two giant folds of fabric you managed to hang on to the neckline of your shirt and hold it up to try and keep it on you. You continued to shrink smaller and smaller though and the shirt was like a giant canvas trailing along the couch. It got heavier, and you lost the handholds you had managing to grab at it desperately again. You were able to hold up just a small corner of the fabric and keep it up just over your unmentionables. Even this felt heavy though and you couldn't really do anything to cover your back. You weren't wearing the shirt anymore, you were now standing in the neck hole of it and trying very desperately to maintain some form of modesty. You seemed to stop shrinking at least, and then suddenly you found a massive paw come down and step on a piece of the shirt next to you. The reddish brown fur identified as belonging to Flare, but she was massive. You had to be an inch tall tops as you were now staring at the toes of your once small vulpix.

You slowly looked up at the now massive fox pokemon as you saw her looming over you and staring down.

"It worked! Awwwww, look how cute you are!" She nosed you, almost knocking you over and nearly making you drop the corner of fabric that was maintaining your modesty. "Ah come on just let go of that it's not really going to do you any good now."

"But Flare I'm naked!" You protested.

"And it's not as if I've never seen you like that before getting out of the shower or anything." Flare said. "Besides it's not like you can hope to actually carry your clothes around."

"But..." With a sigh you let go the shirt corner, it dropped down leaving you naked as the day you were born standing before your giant vulpix. "Why couldn't my clothes shrink too!?" You complained. "And why shrink me in the first place!?"

"Well... I would imagine it's because your clothes didn't eat the berry." Flare said coyly. "And if your clothes do start eating berries it might be a good sign you should stop wearing them. As for that! Cause it'll be fun! Come on!" She nosed you again. This time you did get knocked down flat onto your bottom. You couldn't do a whole lot to physically resist her right now. "Until you change back you can be my little pet! You're way cuter when you're smaller than me ya know! I'll take good care of you too!" She sat up on her hind legs as she moved her fore paws around you and suddenly snagged you. She was thankfully gentle as she pressed you between her two paws and slowly picked up your tiny frame off the couch. You had a sense of vertigo as your legs swung freely in the air unable to find any ground before she suddenly tossed you into the air.

"GAH WHYYYY!" You gave a shout as you flew through the air above Flare's head. A moment later you landed on something very soft and warm. It was bright red and all around you. Standing up you realized you were on top of Flare's head. She had caught you in her hair and was now carrying you around. She quickly jumped down from the couch after catching you. You grabbed onto a few strands of her hair to make sure you didn't lose your balance and fall down. "Okay... Assuming I go with this, because I don't think I have a choice at this point."

"You don't!" Flare responded sounding way more self satisfied than you would have liked.

"Exactly what are we going to do?"
115331121.title: Flare's Little Pet

1153311212.content:
“Isn’t it obvious?” Flare asks in a smarmy tone. “We’re going to be playing inside of course!” she beams with a slight head raise, causing you to grip the tufts of orange fur adorning her crown. “And just what do you mean by play?” you dared to ask trying your best to keep a steady ground on top of her head. “Oh you know? Games and stuff.” She replies vaguely. “Besides. Don’t you think it would be much safer playing inside then outside?” she asks while moving her head slightly. “I mean, if you were outside just think of all the dangers! All those huge pokemon and humans unaware of you.” She states with a small gasp to follow. “This really isn’t giving me much excitement being small Flare.” You state giving her a glare. “Which is exactly why you should stay with me!” she states giddily. “Not like I have a choice…” you mumble.

As much as you hate to admit it, it seemed you were completely under Flare’s supervision for now. Being so small, there was no telling the amount of dangers lying about, especially if you left alone. With a small defeated groan, you kneel down to retain a steady position as you feel Flare walk about in the living room. “E-easy Flare!” You stammer feeling your entire body quickly bounce up and down with each step she made. “Oh, come on Master.” She scoffs. “Just think of it like riding a ponyta!” she giggles. “Except the Ponyta is a ginormous Vulpix…” you call out only managing to increase Flare’s laughter.

After several moments on the bumpy ride, you soon notice Flare making her way towards her small bedding area. “What are you doing?” you ask growing confused over her chosen destination. “Are you going to take a nap or something?” Flare simply guffaws at your remark before coming to a stop besides her round bedding. “As if!” she chuckles. “Do you really think I’m just going to sleep with you so small?” she asks before slowly lowering her head downwards. As you hang on tight close to her three ringed bun, you notice her head tilting straight towards her bedding area. “Alright, just slip on down. I’m sure my bed will break your fall.” She states. “Easier said than done.” You mumble. “Oh, just trust me!” she states in a pouty voice.

With a long sigh, you soon begin to release your grip upon the red fur as gravity begins to pull you downwards. Not exactly fond of heights, you clench your eyes close as you suddenly feel your entire body freefalling off Flare’s head. While it might’ve been seconds in normal time, to you it took quite a while to finally collide onto a soft, cotton like surface. With your nerves shaking in shear excitement and terror, you slowly open your eyes to see Flare’s massive face gazing down at you. “I give you a ten for the landing.” She smirks. “…but a five for the flailing.” She adds sarcastically. “Very funny.” You groan as you slowly try to calm your shaking nerves from the fall.

“Alright then Master. Since you’re so small, how about we play a game of-“
1153311212.title: Gonna play together inside the house!

choices: Try to hide in the bookshelf
Try to hide inside the pokeball
11533112121.content:
"Hide and seek!" Flare said. "That should be fun! I mean you're to small to say do anything with rough housing like tag..." She continued.

"And just who's fault is that?" You asked irritated.

"But hide and seek would be perfect!" Flare responded ignoring your question. "I mean you'd have a real advantage if you think about it. You could hide in a shoe..."

"I'm not hiding in a stinking shoe." You stated flatly.

"Or maybe under a rug." Flare continued to ignore you. You were pretty certain she heard you and was just doing this on purpose. "So I'll turn around and count to ten!" She stops and considers for a moment. "Actually it might take you a bit longer than that to get into a hiding place. You've got those really short legs after all." Flare teased as you looked down at your bare legs slightly embarrassed. You got the feeling that you were going to be the subject of a lot of short jokes before the night was over. "Let's see what's a good number..."

"You know I never even agreed to play yet." You tried to object more.

"You don't want to play with me?" Flare looked down at you with epic pout face number 14. Even as a giant the drooped ears, the wide eyes, the lower part of her muzzle just left open over so slightly and the sagging tails. You tried! You tried to resist the pout! But... You couldn't! You knew it was a lie! You knew she was playing you! She knew you knew she was playing you! And you both knew that you were going to give in.

"Fine, fine." You sagged your shoulders. "But... what are you going to do when you find me I don't want you trying to chase and tackle me. I don't want to get hurt."

"I can't believe you'd think I'd hurt you." Flare whined turning up the fake but effective pout by 30%. "I mean of course, I would be trying to find and catch you." The pouty tone gave way to teasing. "And you wouldn't be hard to catch. Hmmm shame you don't have a tail I could pick you up by... Guess I'll just have to toss you on my head if I catch you!"

"I... Don't like the sound of that." You stuttered.

"Oh it'll be fiiiiiiine." She said in a less than reassuring tone. "I caught you last time didn't I! Anyway ohhhh, we should make a bet. Games are more interesting when there's something at stake... Alright! I got it! Whoever wins gets to decide what we do next!"

"I'm not actually getting a say in this agreement am I?" You asked.

"Well... Of course you get a say in it." Flare responded starting to lower her ears. "I mean if you really want to disappoint me."

"No. No. No stop." You groan. "It's fine just... don't make that fake pouting face again."

"Good!" She smirked. "Alright now I'll count to a hundred! That should give you plenty of time to find a place." With that Flare turned her back to you laid down on the floor and covered her eyes with her fore paws. "One. Two. Three." She started counting.

Immediately you tried to get down from her bedding. It was trickier than you expected. It was soft, but the entire thing was unstable and trying to rush to the side of it you kept tripping over yourself whenever your foot would sink in lower than expected. By the time you got off of her bed and onto the floor she was already up to seventeen. You looked around the floor, and muttered to yourself that if you knew you were going to be shrunk today you would have vacuumed first.

Or avoided being shrunk. One of those two.

You looked around the room. Your home was massive now, and you weren't sure her counting to 100 was enough time for you to find a place in any other room, so you decided you had better stick in here. You thought about going under the couch, but dismissed it for two reasons. She could fit under their too, and you weren't entirely sure you wanted to see what was under your couch. You could try crawling underneath her bed, would she expect you started? Of course you were also worried what would happen if she got bored and came back for a nap. Was the bed padded enough to protect you? Maybe not the best idea.

"Twenty eight. Twenty nine. Thirty." She continued to count.

You didn't have a lot of time to think. You looked around the room trying to figure out the best possible place that might keep you hidden from her... There were two places that came to mind.

There was a bookcase in the room. While you couldn't really climb much of it, you could make it up to the bottom shelf, and there was enough gap between the books and the end of the shelf for you to squeeze yourself behind the actual books and be out of sight. There would be no way for her to find you at all short of ripping all the books off the shelf.

There were also the pants you had been wearing that were now discarded on the floor. Your belt, and by extension the pokeballs worn on your belt were still there. You could try to pry open one of the pokeballs and hide inside of it. Even if Flare checked inside your pants for you would she really think to look inside her own pokeball for you?

There wasn't much time left, you made your decision.
11533112121.title: Hide and Go Seek

choices: You surprisngly manage to win the game
115331121212.content:
As you gaze upon your now massive pile of discarded clothes, your eyes quickly fall upon the massive red and white orb besides your leather belt. "Of course!" you exclaim in your mind, realizing the perfect potential that one specific pokeball had. With a small snicker, you hurriedly make your way down the plain length floors of your living room, straight towards the storing device. There was no way Flare would ever think of looking near that pokeball. One main reason was because it belonged to none other than the now huge vulpix herself, and knowing her, she absolutely despised that thing. When it came to Flare, she would always enjoy wandering about free from her pokeball without a single care in the world. The very idea of being stored inside the orb seemed like a punishment sentence that was the very equivalent of prison to her, though knowing her attitude was a complete over exaggeration. You can't help but recall several times when she would either put up some tantrum or completely wail and cry whenever you urged her to enter in her pokeball. In fact, she scolded you for days just for leaving her in for an hour or two.

Seventy eight-seventy nine-" She continues to count off as you turn to spot her form further down the room.

After a few seconds or so of sprinting, you finally manage to stand before the now ginormous sized ball as you look about its form some ideal means of concealment. At first you were pondering if you should actually clamber your way inside the ball in order to remain hidden from within the room. However, that idea was quickly thrown out as you feared you might end up getting trapt inside of the huge orb by sheer accident.

Eighty!-eighty one-eighty two-" Flare exclaims, almost eager to initiate this game of hide and seek.

With your heart starting to race, you ultimately decide to huddle behind the giant pokeball right against the fabric of your pants. That way, you would remain hidden and also get a small vantage point of her looking about the room. "I hope this works...' you mutter under your breath, unsure what other events Flare had planned with you and your new tiny size.

Ninety seven-Ninety eight-Ninety Nine!~" Flare exclaims the second to last number in a teasing if not cheery voice before finally shouting, "ONE HUNDRED."

At first, you were thinking that Flare would simply take her time and be easy with this game. Seeing as how you were tiny in size, especially when compared to her, she might give you a small chance with this game. However, once she was finished counting Flare quickly takes a leap into the air as her body turns a complete 360 to follow. A loud 'BOOM' echoes from the distance as a small quake emerges from her landing. "Ready or not!" she giggles loudly. "Here comes Flare!" "I certainly hope not..." you stammer as you scoot your body further behind the pokeball.

As you cease your movements behind Flare's pokeball, you can't help but hear the echoing sounds of her loud footsteps crashing downwards. "Where are you?~" her voice asks in a sing song tone. Judging by the way the sounds were emanating down the corner, she seemed to be heading straight towards the right side of the living room. "Come on now, Did you fall in a crack or something?" she asks with a laugh, causing a small twinge of irritation to emerge in your mind. Eventually the booming footsteps sound off once more as you manage to hear her making her way to the left side of the room now. Slowly, you shuffle further towards the right of the pokeball in order to keep hidden from view. To your surprise and shock, you manage to spot the huge Vulpix's body not too far off in the distance, though luckily for you, she Flare didn't seem to take notice of you. "Come on!" she giggles. "I already have so many other ideas we could try out!" she exclaims as a shudder quickly runs down your spine from the thought of her winning.

Quietly, you remain huddled against the huge storage device, hoping that your quick thinking was enough to claim victory over this game. Only time would tell if Flare would actually give up, or press on in search of you.
115331121212.title: sanctuary besides the pokeball

1153311212121.content:
You push your body up against the pokeball trying to remain hidden behind it. Several time you see Flare go running past you hurriedly checking another part of the room as you would slide around the pokeball always keeping it between her and you in order to remain out of sight. You tried to still your breathing as much as possible very aware of how much noise your breathing is making. Then again, considering how small you were it's more likely your breathing was barely notcieable at all, but you wouldn't put it past your vulpix's ears to pick it up.

The seconds trailed by each one seeming to be an eternity as you worried about if you'd find it. Then, the seconds started to go by even slower as you suddenly realize she's not finding you, and you start to get a little bored. Waiting around to be found is actually pretty boring, and after awhile you're not even worried about what happens when she finds you or what games she might want to play. You almost start to get sleepy and nod off waiting for her before finally she shouts oh.

"ARGH! Where are you!? Did you shrink even smaller or something you're not anywhere!" Flare shouted in annoyance. You almost shouted back a reply before you realized that the game was in fact still going on. You weren't going to alert her until she conceded defeat. She continued to dash around the room looking before finally collapsing onto her stomach only a foot away from you.

"Oh fine!" Flare pouted. "I guess you win."

With this you finally emerged from behind the pokeball and cautiously waved in her direction to get her attention.

"Over there the entire time!" Flare glared at the pokeball. "That's not even fair. Ah well, I'll win the next game and I have a great idea!"

"Not so fast!" You shouted. "I won so I get to pick! That's what you said!" You were determined to stand your ground.

"Fiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiine." Flare said it with the tone that she was doing a huge favor, despite the fact you had won this right on your own. "What do you want?"

"Well. Really right now I think I just want to find something to wear so I'm not running around starkers like this."

"Eeee!" Flare squeed in a way that made you incredibly uncomfortable. "We'll play dress up!" She shouted happily.

You suddenly realized that you may have errored, perhaps you should quickly suggest another game before Flare decides to play fashion model with you. Then again, at least it'd get you something to wear.
1153311212121.title: Game Over, You Win!

11533112121211.content:
The idea of playing dress up sounded like a completely torturous and demeaning task for you to complete, especially when considering you would be acting as the doll for the whole thing.

“N-Now hold on Flare!” You stammer while raising your hands up defensively. “There’s no need to go try and become a complete fashionista here Just a simple pair of clothes should do...nothing more!” You state, hoping to reason with her. Despite your attempt however, Flare’s head was raised high as her attention seemed to focus solely upon her own imagination.

“Oh! We can try dressing you up in a pretty dress! OOH! Or even make you look like a princess.” She giggles as her mind seemed to be focused upon her own lala land.

“None of those!” you quickly shout, managing to finally catch her attention. “I. AM. NOT. DRESSING. UP. AS. A. PRINCESS!” You shout with a scowl, making sure to speak each word loud and clear to get your point across.

Flare seemed to be taken aback by your small outburst as she simply stares at you with mouth slightly agape. After a second or so of silence, she finally spoke. “Fine.” She says in a tone that surprisingly carried no hint of bitterness or disappointment.

“Listen, I don’t…wait what?” you gaze up in a stupefied fashion, shocked by the words that escaped her mouth. “Did you just say...fine?” you ask, unsure if your ears were playing tricks on you.

“Yup.” Flare, nods her head as a blank expression was glued upon her face. This seemed odd, way too odd to be precise. Never before have you seen Flare so understanding over something, especially something that she wants to do. A small sense of relief begins to well up inside you as you begin to wonder if Flare was actually going to calm down from her mischievous escapades.

“I won’t dress you up as a princess.” She says before shooting out a toothy grin. “Instead, I think you’d look good as a-“
11533112121211.title: Dress up time?

choices: Time for a board game! You get to be your own piece!
I think we should play with some toy cars!
1153311212122.content:
You crouched low against the pokeball as Flare bounded across the room. You found yourself questioning your judgement almost immediately. Even if she didn't find you being down here on the ground risked being run over by the hyperactive vulpix as she tore across the room looking for you. Flare ran past you several times, and anytime she did you moved to the opposite side of the pokeball to keep it between you and her. You wanted to make sure that you were obscured from view at all times.

You wondered how long the game would actually go for, and it occurred to you that you probably should have forced Flare to commit to a time limit before the game started. She could basically keep going until she got bored. Well, one good thing about her was she did seem to get bored easily, at least she did anytime you tried to do any actual training. Maybe that was a good indication that the game wouldn't last long.

While you were thinking, it suddenly occurred to you that it was very quiet in the room. You no longer heard the trampling of her paws as she ran around. You very cautiously poked your head out from around the pokeball looking for her, and you didn't see her anywhere in the room. Did she leave you here by yourself? You craned your head trying to see if maybe she was just hidden somewhere else in the room waiting for you to come out to strike.

You didn't see her.

You for a very brief moment felt some form of relief. Then you felt a massive but cold wet nose pressed against the entirety of your backside. The sudden force of it sent you toppling over onto your stomach.

"Found you!" Flare shouted happily despite being right next to you. Somehow she had snuck over onto this side of the room without you realizing. "Guess that means I win!" She said happily. "Ohhhhh and I have so many ideas of what we can play next. Ohhhh it's hard just to pick one..." You had barely managed to climb back onto your feet before she proudly announced what the two of you would be doing next.
1153311212122.title: Game Over, Flare Wins

choices: You've shrunken mysteriously and Ninetails is sleeping on you still.
1153312.content:
It had been another long day at work for you, driving home meant you had the rest of the night to yourself, and your Ninetails of course. You'd never had a Vulpix, you just one day heard a knock at your door and when you went to answer, there was a Ninetails sitting on your doorstep. You looked around but never did find the person who left it there.

As you walked into your house, you were greeted by your Ninetails, who tackled you right as you came in. To be honest, she'd only been here a week, and you didn't mind it one bit. She was quite affectionate and always did this as you came in. "Hey Ninetails," you said gently stroking her head as she nuzzled you happily. As you continued to pet your companion, you moved your hand down her back, stopping right above one of her legs and rubbing it back and forth. Ninetails began kicking one of her legs, like every dog does when you find that one sweet spot on their body, and let a satisfied, "Nine" as she lowered her head onto your right shoulder and began to make a strange purr-like noise as she continued to nuzzle you after lifting her head again.

After another minute or so, Ninetails stood up and let you stand up to do whatever. You just walked over to the couch in the living room and sat down, patting right next to you to get her up with you. You haven't been watching her for long before she leaves the room and enters the kitchen, returning a few seconds later chewing on something. You notice her holding a half-eaten small blue berry in her paws, which she quickly stuffs into her mouth and finishes off once she enters the living room again. She walks over to the couch you are on and hops up beside you before getting on your lap. She puts her paws on your chest and stares into your eyes as she finishes chewing and swallowing the berry. You look back at her awkwardly, unsure of what she's doing. She's never done this kind of thing before.

"What's up, Oshawott?" you ask her nervously. The Oshawott does not reply. Instead, she simply puffs out her cheeks and then spits a blast of water at your face. You splutter and flail your arms, but your Oshawott hangs on to your shirt. You shake your head quickly and glare at her, asking why she did that, but you start to feel strange within moments. Your head starts spinning, and the weight of your Oshawott on your lap seems to increase greatly. Your Oshawott's eyes widen and she barks happily, smiling at you as you start to feel ever more lightheaded. And you can swear that she seems to be getting bigger...

You open your eyes, not having realized that you just blacked out. You look around, and realize that you are still on your couch. However, two things are wrong. First, you appear to have somehow shrunk. That stunning realization takes time to set in, and you are quickly distracted by the second thing you noticed: your Oshawott is currently looming over you.

You look up at her, and realize that she is many times your size. You can't tell just how big, though, but you can estimate that you're currently around the size of one of her toys. You stare at her, and big dark eyes stare back at you as she grins widely. She barks happily, hurting your ears, before quickly reaching down with a paw. You don't even move, and the giant Pokemon grabs you roughly, raising you up to her freckled face and continuing to grin widely. You stare at her in shock, still not fully comprehending what is going on. But what you can comprehend is the meaning behind her grin. You've been with this Oshawott long enough to know that this sort of grin means that she is feeling...
1153322222222112.title: Female Oshawott

1153322222222211.content:
You lay on the couch, staring at the ceiling, when you feel a certain pink fluffy psychic type jump onto your just. You look down to see Mew looking at you with glee in her eyes. You chuckle, "I'm guessing you want to do something?"

Mew smiles "I thought I was the psychic one."

You slowly get up, allowing Mew to get off you, as she floats in front of you. "Nah, I'm just a good guesser." You respond, "So what do you want to do? Play some Tag?"

"Well, I was thinking of doing something new, something I'm pretty sure we haven't done yet." Mew says, her grin getting wider now.

"Something new, you say?" You curiously ask, "I guess we can do it now, if you really want to."

Mew shuffles a little bit in midair, "I was hoping you would say yes. Now, all you need to do is stay there."

You look at her confused "Uh, okay. Do you want me to close my eyes or something?"

Mew nonchalantly says "Sure, if you really want to." and then puts her palms on your chest, as you feel a slight warm feeling spreading from the places she's touching.

For some reason, your brain goes into a subconscious, like you cannot move at all, but you are still feel and see. You see the area around start to grow bigger, so does Mew, as she has a look of both shock and happiness. You soon realize that it's not everything that's growing, you're shrinking. You shrinking continues, until your about double the size of Mew's palm, about 2 inches, where Mew stops to take a breather.

You snap out of your subconscious state, and try to wake your bit numb body up. Meanwhile, Mew takes a seat right next to you, lifting you up off the ground a little because of the size difference between you two. "*Huff* That took a *Puff* lot of energy from me. I need a breather." Mew panted, clearly a bit worn out from shrinking you.

You try to climb on one of Mew's thighs, emphasis on the word "tried". You couldn't get a good grip on it for the life of you, but luckily, Mew noticed you struggles, and picked you up manually, bringing you to her shining blue eyes. You say "Well, this isn't what I thought was going to happen."

Mew giggles at your remark "Life is full of surprises, isn't it."

You look at your new big friend and smile, "So, what do you want to do with our new size?"

Mew looks into space a little, before thinking of an answer. "Why not we play...."
1153322222222211.title: Pink Psychic Pheline

It's been a long day in the Hoenn region and you decide to take a visit to Forina before walking home to Lavaridge. Most people didn't even know Forina existed, so it was nice to get some piece and quiet with the wild pokemon in the area creating the voices of the forest.

Today wasn't the best day for you. You had tried to take on the gym leader in your town but instead were met with defeat and the loss of your allowance for the week. On your pokemon hunt for the day, there wasn't anything new to discover; just the same old machops and numels. Long story short, things didn't go as planned, and this nice walk was making up for it.

About to head back, you couldn't help but notice a small yellow-ish figure flying out of a nearby cave. Curious, you walked over to where it looked like it was headed. You were beyond surprised to find out that thing is the legendary pokemon, Jirachi! Noticing you, Jirachi quickly got up and flew away, faster this time. You weren't going to let this moment escape from you, nothing has been going your way today and you're determined to change that.

11533222222222222223331212.content:
One day, you and your best friend, a Flaaffy which you named Ampere, were taking a rest under a nice apple tree in the afternoon sun. The breeze was pleasant and having Ampere sound asleep on your shoulder was comforting. Being as relaxed and sleepy you are, you fall asleep with your fluffy friend, thinking on how this day could not go wrong.

~3 Hours pass~

You wake up to the sound of Ampere's cry. You look up drowsily to see that, through the leaves of the tree, the sky is a bright orange, with a bit of stars showing. Ampere is probably concerned on how late it is you think as you get up to stretch. Looking around, however, you notice that the grass was up to your knees, and was that tree that big before? It didn't take long for you to notice that you had shrunk, and quite a bit. Looking around some more, you see Ampere, looking for you frantically.

You run down towards Ampere's direction, jumping and calling her name. As you get closer, you truly see how small you actually are, almost as tall as Ampere's foot. You soon get close to Ampere and call her name again, this time, she reacts, looking for you in every direction except down. You call for her again, and she begins to walk at your direction.

But does she see you?
11533222222222222223331212.title: Female

falls asleep with you in hand

Ampere runs to your position, and grabs you with haste. "It's okay, Ampere, I'm al-" but before you are able to finish your sentence, Ampere binds your body to her chest with both arms, hugging you very close to her. You look up to see Ampere crying, tears running down her face.

She must have thought I abandoned her you think, comforting your giant Flaaffy as she tries to stop the waterworks. "Shh, I'm here for you Ampere, everything is going to be alright" You say, as she squeezes your body a bit harder, but not enough to truly hurt you. After a few moments more of her hugging you. Ampere pulls you away from her chest to her head, giving you a good look of her.

You smile, "We should probably head home, since it's getting late and all." The sun had already set and the moon had already been out for some time. She gives you a worried look, as if to say: "What about you height?" You chuckle, patting her on the nose, "Don't worry, we'll focus on the height situation tomorrow, but for right now, we should go."

Ampere nods her head, as she lifts you up to put you in her fluff on top of her head. You cling on to it, feeling the softness of it, as she starts to run back toward your house. Luckily, since of how thick Ampere's fluff is, you do not get thrown off by the wind. As she enters your house, you see that she is running to your bedroom.

Once she gets there, Ampere grabs you from her wool, as she...

115332222222222222233321111.content:
"Why not we play some hide and seek. It's been forever since we've played that!" Zorua shook his bushy tail in excitement.

"I'm guessing you want to seek first?" You ask. Zorua shakes his head.

"Nope, I want to try out a spot I found while you were away at work. That means you get to be the seeker." Zorua explains, already rearing to go and hide.

"C'mon, you're clearly underestimating my seeking skills" You jokingly say, as you stand up from the couch. "I'll go ahead and turn around and count." You turn away and hear Zorua scamper through the halls. "1.....2.....3........4.............." Suddenly, you feel a sharp pain in your chest, as you drop to the floor. You try to call out to your buddy for help, but all you manage out is a multitude of sharp gasps. You feel beads of sweat fall down your face, as it becomes harder and harder to breath, until the pain suddenly stops. The pain then transformed to a warm, blissful feeling covering your whole body.

You then hear running coming from the other room, as Zorua came running in, looking worried. "I heard some commotion happen? Is everything alright?" You try to stand back up, but your body wouldn't move, but you did notice something weird. Zorua was a lot bigger than you remember,and as Zorua approaches you, a very shocked expression then fills Zorua's face. "Oh my...... How'd this happen?"

You finally begin to take control of your body, as you stand up, but you notice that everything is off. You have shrunken, but not only that, but you are still shrinking. "W-what's happening to me?" You shakily say, moving closer to Zorua for help. Comparing your size to Zorua's, (0.7m) you are at least 0.5m, to Zorua's chest, and still shrinking.

"I have no idea. I mean, look at the bright side, at least your clothing shrunk with" That is true, you're clothes did shrink with you, which is a plus. "We should probably get you to your room, y'know, before you shrink small enough to become microscopic." Zorua suggested, "Here, let me help you." Zorua picks you up by your shirt by his mouth, since you now shrunken to 0.05 meters in that short time span alone, but you luckily stopped growing.

You both make it to your bedroom, and, looking around, it feels like a whole different area. A place you've gone in and out of has a unfamiliarity to it with your new size. You then feel a lurch, as Zorua jumps onto the bed above. He drops you off on the bed, and lays down. You also sit down next to the now gigantic Zorua. Comparing you to Zorua now, you're just as big as his paws are wide, maybe even smaller.

"Sooo..... I was thinking maybe we could still play hide and seek, but with your.... new height. Zorua says slowly, not really facing towards you. "Orrr....." He moves his head to face you, as you feel a bit of his hot breath in waves. "Or maybe we could try out some other things with your shrunken state?" He says in a more fast tone.

You think on it for a second, before responding with...
115332222222222222233321111.title: Hide-and-Shrink
