12521111221.content:
You and your Charizard were flying over a vast forest, searching for a rare Pokémon that was supposedly within the forest. Your partner lands and you climb off his back. The two of you walk for awhile before something catches your eye. It was the rare Pokémon, your intel however didn’t tell you it was Mew out here.

“Let’s go Reflet!” You call. Your Charizard roars in response as he rushes forward.

Mew easily evades Charizard and looks at you. It’s eyes flash before your engulfed in a pink light. Your vision blurs but you hear Charizard’s concerned roar before you fall unconscious.

You wake hours later back at your apartment. Everything however looks huge. Fear sets in and you look yourself over realizing you’d shrunk to 2 inches in height. “Reflet!” You call in a panic as you look around for your partner.

Your Charizard comes into the room and sighs seeing your awake. He walks over to you, a look of concern in his eyes. He gently picks you up in his claw as he looks you over.

The two of you make your way to the living room and take some time to adjust to your new height. After about half an hour, the two of decide...
12521111221.title: Male Charizard

125211112212.content:
You and Reflet decide to have a little fun before trying to find Mew again. But what sort of fun could you have at your new height. Playing tag was out of the question due to how easily your Charizard could catch you. You look your massive partner over and think up something. “How about exploration?” You suggest.

He tilts his head confused. You can’t help but grin at his confusion, ever since he was a Charmander, you found it adorable. And while you would never admit it to anyone, you sort of liked your Charizard in the nine normal way. “You can sit back and relax, while I explore you at this height.” You hopes that made sense to him.

Reflet thought for a moment then nodded. He laid down on the floor, turned on the radio and relaxed. Once he was comfortable he set you down next to him and smiled. You for your part thought of where on your big partner you wanted to explore. First you wanted to make sure he could feel your movements. So you climbed onto his tail and walked around. Reflet lifted his head and looked right at you.

“You felt the movements?” You asked wanting to be certain. He nods confirming such before resting his head on his claws. You grin and continue.
125211112212.title: Bit of fun

1252111122121.content:
You grinnas you climb up your massive Charizard’s back. As you walk you occasionally stop and rub parts of his back giving special attention to the area near his wings. He purrs in gratitude and smiles over his shoulder you. You smile back and continue your climb. Soon you reach the base of neck and decided to keep going.

You reach his head and slide down until your lying on his snout. Reflet’s eyes focus on your tiny form and he smiles watching you. His tongue snakes out and give you a long lick before he relaxes again. You smile and rub his snout. In truth you liked the sensation of his tongue on your tiny form and wanted more. “Hey um... Reflet...” you begin.

Your Charizard snaps to full attention and looks at you waiting for you to continue. You nervously smile as your gazes lock. “Could I maybe climb into your mouth? I liked the feeling of your tongue against my skin.” You explain.

He looks puzzled at first but gives you a small nod. He flicks his head back, sending you into the air. As you come plummeting down, you land on his moist tongue. He waits til he’s certain that you’re clear of his fangs before closing his mouth again you.

You snuggle into his warm tongue and lay on your side, hugging the appendage. He purrs around you and enjoys having you inside him. His tongue tip licks you over a few times, clearly enjoying your taste. You snuggle into his tongue again, making yourself comfortable. Glancing back you can see the entrance to his throat and begin to wonder what it would be like to go down Reflet’s throat.
